story:
PAY IT FORWARD and HELP A VET

We have all heard about the negative effects of trauma on our military personnel.
At least 20% of our military have depression and / or PTSD in a given year.

They experience:

  • difficulty with sleep routines
  • loss of interest or pleasure in activities
  • feelings of worthlessness and/or guilt
  • difficulty concentrating and/or making decisions
  • thoughts of ending their life (288 Active Duty Service members took their lives in 2014) 

YOU CAN HELP

You can sponsor a military member - veteran or active duty - for a researched and proven program that can relieve depression and trauma:

  • for you
  • for a loved one
  • for a friend
  • or for someone in need that we identify and reach out to

TWO PRACTITIONERS : TWO PROGRAMS

Teri Mahaney, PhD, and Beth Lorenzo, MBA HHP, have over 40 years of experience helping people with trauma. Both practitioners are dedicated to giving back to military personnel - and are offering their different services at a 66% reduced rate. Each will provide her program for $100 for this PAY IT FORWARD campaign.

THE PRACTITIONERS

Dr. Teri Mahaney, creator of the Change Your Mind program, presents at international conferences on her research and work treating trauma.  Her specialty is the theta brain wave state - the sleep state - and trauma.  She worked on military bases for 10 years in the US and abroad, and has over 25 years experience working with private clients from all walks of life - including NBA and NFL players.

Beth Lorenzo worked with the Department of Defense as a civilian for the Air Force and the Navy for over 7 years. She has studied and practiced as a Holistic Health Practitioner for over 8 years with her prime focus as a certified massage therapist. As a certified TRE® provider, Beth has found TRE® to work gently with the physical body to release trauma.

Teri and Beth have worked together for several years with excellent results. Please click on the gallery tab for videos on the programs.

THE PROGRAMS


Dr. Teri Mahaney's Change Your Mind SuperSleep® Program includes:

    • an initial phone consultation and regular follow up
    • a personally designed 90 day program of her Change Your Mind SuperSleep® CDs
    • her SuperSleep® “brain book” 

For videos, Q&A, research, etc. visit: www.changeyourmind.com

Beth Lorenzo's TRE® Program (Tension and Trauma Releasing Exercises) include:
    • an initial phone consultation
    • two 1-hour TRE® sessions (in person or via skype or Facetime)
    • a book on The Revolutionary Trauma Release Process - hard copy or Kindle edition
For more information, visit: www.mindfulliving101.com
For videos of the TRE process and results: www.traumaprevention.com

IMPACT

You CAN change a life.

Any amount is gratefully accepted and will contribute to a sponsorship for a $100 program.
  • A $100 donation will provide a FULL program a military member.
  • A $200 donation will provide BOTH programs to a military member.
You can sponsor yourself, a loved one, a friend - or donate for someone we find and reach out to.  
OUR GOAL: to reach 18 veteran or active duty personnel
OUR DREAM: to reach 100!
We will contact you personally when this funding campaign ends to make arrangements for the program delivery and private name submission.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

If you can't contribute, you CAN still help!
  • Please get the word out by forwarding this campaign to others.
  • You can do this by email, text, social media, or even the Indiegogo share tool.

Thanks for your time and donation.  We respect your privacy, and total confidentiality is our professional standard.  

These programs are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. Medical advice can only be obtained from a physician or qualified practitioner. Results may vary between individuals, and there are no guarantees expressed or implied.

story:
The City of Lexington is a small bedroom community located in southeast Anoka County in Minnesota. With a population of 2,049 and limited business/industrial development, our residents experience a higher than normal tax rate compared to other cities in the metro area.

Efforts being discussed within the DuWayne Ave Neighborhood include property maintenance initiatives which will help rental property owner’s update, upgrade or modernize their current buildings. Water conservation, energy efficiency, and outside storage spaces are just some of the areas where these initiatives can benefit the property owner, the tenant, and the entire neighborhood.

DuWayne Ave Park is the first step in revitalizing the neighborhood. There are several multi-family apartment complexes in the area, and the park upgrades will be a great addition to the community.

This funding site will give those who live and work within the neighborhood, as well as those who love neighborhood parks, an opportunity to contribute funds and watch the progress of our fundraising efforts.

We have chosen this venue to find donations for the outdoor activities associated with the park. Other funding sources will be used for the remaining portions of the park.

Campaign: April 18, 2015 - July 18, 2015

If you are a business owner or manager in the City of Lexington, please contact City Hall for business donations.

**OUTDOOR ACTIVITIES  OF PHASE I:**   
   
Basketball Court - $1,690
Basketball Outfit - $3,396
Swing Set - $4,940
Fibar Playground Surfacing and Drainage System - $10,582
Benches, Litter Receptacles, and Drinking Fountain - $11,440
Installation - $9,620

**TOTAL THIS PORTION OF PROJECT** - $41,668

**TOTAL PROJECT COST** - $209,389

story:
FOR OBVIOUS REASONS WE CANNOT ACCEPT CONTRIBUTIONS FROM LANDLORDS, LETTING AGENTS, ESTATE AGENTS OR ANY OTHER AFFILIATIONS.
We're a review website, how would it look taking money from those being reviewed?

We think tenants deserve a rental market that is clear, informative and honest.

Marks Out Of Tenancy offers tenants the power to rate landlords, letting agents, properties and areas from individual experiences and offers insights into the market from those who have lived it. 

 

Almost everyone has a renting story - good, bad, humorous, terrifying, expensive, distressing, life changing...frustrating. Ask the person next to you now, "What was your worst rental experience" - it'll probably appall you - but we want to hear it, the world needs to hear it. Your landlord needs to hear it.

Buying a house for most people will remain something of a pipe dream for many years, and may never be realised. You'll be making your home in a house owned by someone else. That person has responsibilities to you - you are paying them money - probably half your monthly in many cases - it's a LOT of money.

It’s the same story the world over; more and more people are renting, and people are paying more and more on their rent. America, Australia, UK, Europe - renting is on the rise, so we want to make sure landlords and letting agents are performing to the highest standard possible.

You wouldn't accept poor quality product or service from anywhere else, if your hotel room isn't up to scratch - you let them know. You buy a bad product online - you send it back.

So why can't we do that with our rental properties? The places in which we eat, sleep and live. Accountability can only be enforced when there is a voice, many voices, asking the same questions - "Why is my home expensive and badly maintained?", "Where is my deposit?", "Why can I be evicted without explanation?" 

A review website about rental properties bursting at the seams with stories of rip-offs, injustice, misery, injury, frustration and calls for change will...change the private rental market. Similarly, tales of great landlords who make renting a pleasure will encourage others to strive to do the same. It will provide a platform for voices of renters whilst they are renting, after they rent and when they are looking for new home to rent. We want to restore balance in a market that has been controlled by landlords and letting agents for so long.

Altruism is the fuel for this change. This knowledge, curated, collated and organised in a powerful and contemporary website is a powerful tool for change. Share your voice so others may improve their lives.

You will spend 25% of all the money you earn in your life on renting - let's make it a good purchase.


Users are able to view and contribute to ratings and reviews of properties, landlords, letting agents and areas, giving the richest and most true-to-life picture of the renting market available. You’ll be able to hear the experiences of real tenants who have lived in the properties you’re viewing, not the wide angle lenses and endless euphemisms offered by those trying to get any old signature on the tenancy agreement.  


After contributing a review, you are able to store your tenancy history privately and securely on our site. This offers users the opportunity to store contact numbers, energy certificates, broadband suppliers - everything that pertains to any of your tenancies that you might need to call upon is available and only a click away.  On top of all of this you can look back at all your old ratings and reviews, hopefully from a much more comfortable and secure home.  



We love information because the more information available to tenants the fairer a market we can develop. Once we start to build a real community on Marks Out Of Tenancy, we can offer detailed insight and analysis of the market from the tenant’s perspective. Pulling the data that we input together, we can start to build solid evidence showing what’s good and bad about the private rental market - Which city has the most eco-friendly properties? Where is home to the best landlords? Where do people tend to move to when they leave London? - we want to provide tenants with data that is going to help them to make the most informed decision when it comes to moving house.  


Our focus is always going to be about balancing the market. We understand there are drastic changes that need to be made to ease issues in the Private Rental Sector and we support those working to make this happen. We’re here to make sure renters gets the best possible experience from their tenancy and if that’s not so, we’re here to make sure others don’t fall into the same trap.

We're not making a gadget, or a film, or a transmedia experience. Essentially, we're making a review website, with the aim to initiate a fundamental shift in the private rental market - we want to start a movement.

Firstly, thank you for your support, whatever it is - if you pledged money for perks - amazing -  thank you. If you just shared a story with a friend about a terrible renting experience, thank you also - the more people talking about a re-balancing of the rental space the better.

Ok, brass tacks - what are we going to spend the money on?:

  • A website, but this is no cookie cutter WordPress theme we're going to throw up in an afternoon; this is a full fat, bespoke, ground-up build that will handle thousands of tenant review, millions of data points and be optimised for international usage. We're including: 
  • Telling people about Marks Out of Tenancy (yeah, marketing) - without a healthy and vibrant user community a review website is...just a website.
  • Staffing - we're planning long term, we are three guys fleshing out a concept that has a huge ground swell of support developing - at the grassroots level and in local and national governmental discourse. We're gonna need good people, who share our ideologies, energy and intent. 



We understand rents are rising, so if you’re into the idea but your income is steadily siphoned into the pocket of your landlord, do not worry. You can help by just letting your friends know about our project. Tweet your us your stories, share your grossest housing problems with us on Instagram, share the word.

Without getting involved we can’t begin to make a difference, so let’s get together and take back control.



Facebook

Twitter

Instagram
Email us at voice@marksoutoftenancy.com, tell us your story or ask more about ours.

story:
Selection, Savings & Rewards at Organic Dried Food

Healthy Products at Wholesale Prices with Free Home Shipping* 

Organic Dried Food is the largest online Organic Marketplace offering 37,000 organic and natural products, from 2,200 brands, at wholesale prices, delivered free* to your home from 4 warehouses (2 on the East Coast and 2 on the West Coast). For people who want to make healthier choices in their lives and save money at the same time.

Health conscious customers can shop and purchase at wholesale prices (up to 50% below retail) for organic and natural products in categories such as; Food & Beverage, Baby & Children, Pets, Health & Beauty, Vitamins & Minerals, Sports & Fitness, Health Supplements and Eco-Home.  

The company offers popular brands like Newman's Own, Bob’s Red Mill, Eden Foods, Annie's Homegrown, Earth's Best, Jason Naturals and over two thousand more.  

* free shipping on all orders over $49


Join The Cause!

Your contribution will make a difference! The money we raise will kick off our marketing efforts to make people aware of the over 37,000 healthy products they can find at OrganicDriedFood.com.  Our goal is to raise $15,000. All of the money we raise will be spent on advertising www.OrganicDriedFood.com.  Everything is ready now!  We are all dressed up and ready to go! If you are passionate about making "healthy food & products" accessible for everyone, then we ask you to Join the Cause!

Eat Organic - Become a Backer - Great Perks!

All our Backers receive perks when you join our effort!  Get 10% - 15% "additional discounts" on all products purchased on our site for 3 months, 6 months, 1 and even 2 years.  In addition to "extra discounts" we also provide other perks such as: Collectible Tee Shirts, Travel Club Membership, Utah Day Trips and even a week anywhere in the world.  And all Backers get recognized on our Backer Page on our website.


Our Customers Receive Rewards

Our customers receive Rewards when they sign up for a free account, make a purchase, refer a friend (friend receives a discount), or share our website on Twitter or Facebook.  Rewards can be redeemed for discounts or donated to Feeding America. 

We Support Social Good

(www.feedingamerica.org)

In America, hunger, food insecurity, and poverty affects people of all walks of life. The productivity of our country would greatly improve if we addressed this root issue and helped feed everyone in need. 

The Feeding America nationwide network of food banks help families across the nation get the support they need to find nutritious food to eat.  Organic Dried Food Customers through our Rewards Program, can opt to donate a cash equivalent of their Rewards to Feeding America (www.FeedingAmerica.org).  

Feeding America serves 46.5 million Americans in need.  We are pleased to support The Feeding America network of food banks that leads the fight against hunger in communities nationwide.

Two Other Ways You Can Help

Indiegogo Referral Program:

You can help us by telling your friends through the Indiegogo Referral Program about this opportunity and the rewards they can get on this crowdfunding event. Use the Indiegogo share tools on this screen to share with your friends!  The Backer who generates the most funds through the Indiegogo Referral Program will win a "Special Mystery Reward". 

Organic Dried Food Referral: 

Go to www.OrganicDriedFood.com and sign up for the rewards program (green tab). Then, refer a few friends. You are actually sending them a savings coupon which they will appreciate.  As they buy products, they save and you earn referral rewards that you can use to buy product, or donate to Feeding America Charity!

story_txt:
Selection, Savings & Rewards at Organic Dried Food


Healthy Products at Wholesale Prices with Free Home Shipping* 


Organic Dried Food is the largest online Organic Marketplace offering 37,000 organic and natural products, from 2,200 brands, at wholesale prices, delivered free* to your home from 4 warehouses (2 on the East Coast and 2 on the West Coast). For people who want to make healthier choices in their lives and save money at the same time.

Health conscious customers can shop and purchase at
wholesale prices (up to 50% below retail) for organic
and natural products in categories such as; Food & Beverage, Baby &
Children, Pets, Health & Beauty, Vitamins & Minerals, Sports &
Fitness, Health Supplements and Eco-Home.  
The company offers popular brands like
Newman's Own, Bob’s Red Mill, Eden Foods, Annie's Homegrown, Earth's Best,
Jason Naturals and over two thousand more.  
* free shipping on all orders over $49






Join The Cause!
Your contribution will make a difference! The money we raise will kick off our marketing efforts to make people aware of the over 37,000 healthy products they can find at OrganicDriedFood.com.  Our goal is to raise $15,000. All of the money we raise will be spent on advertising www.OrganicDriedFood.com.  Everything is ready now!  We are all dressed up and ready to go! If you are passionate about making "healthy food & products" accessible for everyone, then we ask you to Join the Cause!





Eat Organic - Become a Backer - Great Perks!




All our Backers
receive perks when you join our effort!  Get 10% - 15% "additional
discounts" on all products purchased on our site for 3 months, 6 months, 1
and even 2 years.  In addition to "extra discounts" we also
provide other perks such as: Collectible Tee Shirts, Travel Club Membership, Utah Day
Trips and even a week anywhere in the world.  And all Backers get recognized on our Backer Page on our website.








Our Customers Receive Rewards

Our customers receive Rewards when they sign up for a free account, make a purchase, refer a friend (friend receives a discount), or share our website on Twitter or Facebook.  Rewards can be redeemed for discounts or donated to Feeding America.

story:
Hi, my name Calogero and I have been friends with a cosmetics engineer that has worked for big cosmetic brands. And one thing that really frustrates us are how these brands are ripping us off and creating and branding more products than are needed, as essential. So our goal is to produce high-end cosmetic products at a mid-range price, that combine multiple concerns into one. ANAVO, revolutionising one product at a time!

The cosmetic REVOLUTIONIZER !

If you want to treat you and your body at the same time you're looking in the right place...
Our unique formula of essential oils combined with our totally irresistible and powerful deep skin rejuvenating cream creates a new reason to feel younger. Rosehip oil penetrates to the deepest layers of the skin where it regenerates cells, increasing collagen production. It is rich in vitamin C, Omega-3 and Omega-6, all of which are known to help heal scar tissue.

All While antioxidant rich, avocado oil repairs sun damaged skin, it reduces and eliminates itching sensations.
Jojoba oil not only helps create a barrier against the sun but also intensely moisturizes your skin by locking on to skin fibers, this not only creates more permanent soft skin but also controls the amount of oil your skin produces. Helping to eliminate body acne.

Our custom blend of Coco, aloe and coconut butters achieve effortless rejuvenation and moisturisation, proven to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and removal of aging spots.
Evening primrose oil tightens the skin, reducing the appearance and formation of wrinkles.

All of these skin energizing oils are condensed into a light cream that upon touch to the skin unraveles into a truly irresistible texture combined with our custom sent's provides a feeling of being at a luxurious spa right in the comfort of your home and pocket.
All of this is made by hand, in right here in London by our cosmetic engineers, to provide maximum benefits of rejuvenation and moisturization along with a sensational feeling of tight and toned skin.

What We Need & What You Get

With our funding, we are going to split it into 3 categories: awareness, product testing and certification, and future product development.

By funding us we are able to:

-Provide patients for our unique oil formulas that moisturize, protect and cleanse the skin making it cheaper for us to produce the product meaning you have to spend less.

-Create better customer relationships by improving packaging, sales methods and a reduced shipment cost.

-Develop new and innovative methods of producing cosmetics, to allow our products to be used by everyone while maintaining a high-quality finish.

The Impact

Many may not be aware of how much waste is produced to make luxurious cosmetics. Our goal is to create a sustainable cosmetics company that provide the highest end quality without breaking the bank nor the environment. With this money, we will be able to develop sustainable packaging, through the means of recycling. 

Our carbon footprint matters too, so our laboratory is fitted with solar panels to keep CO2 emissions at a low.

Our long term goal is to provide fair payments to our African farmers, and to provide their children with education, however, this is not possible without your help.

story:
Short Summary

Using our revolutionary engine, Panaroamer connects people with similar interests. Panaroamer utilizes an interest-based algorithm allowing people to discover one another. It provides for communication from user to user, business to consumer, and business to business, allowing our users to create specialized communities. 

The first community for Panaroamer will be our ride share solution. The plan is to deliver a ride share solution that gives more control to the drivers and riders in our community.

   

NOTE : Final Screen Layouts Pending Usability Tests and Feedback

Below are some of the initial features of Panaroamer:

Drivers get to keep more of their earnings:

  • We only charge a fixed monthly fee to use our technology.
  • Built in tipping system, which drivers get to keep.
  • Drivers set their rates.
The chart below shows how much more of their earnings a driver gets to keep using Panaroamer.  The more you make the more you keep!

Integrated with popular payment systems.

Riders get to choose their drivers based on ratings and rates.

Schedule rides:

  • Work with your clients to set pick up times.
  • Allows drivers to become more efficient.
  • Allows riders to plan for rides.

Drivers can build their own clientele:

  • Drivers can create a full profile to attract more business.
  • Drivers get to choose their clients based on the rating system.
  • Connect with your riders and offer them more personalized service.

Review system is viewable by everyone:

  • All drivers get reviewed with a rating system and any notes from previous riders.
  • All riders get reviewed with a rating system and any notes from previous drivers

                                     

NOTE: Final Screen Layouts Pending Usability Tests and Feedback

Our goal is to give those drivers that want to participate in ride sharing a chance to start to build their customer base before the launch date, scheduled for September/October time frame. This will also allow us to work closely with drivers to build a solution that works best for them.  Panaroamer runs on the Android, Apple (iOS), and popular Internet browsers (Chrome, Safari, Firefox, etc..). 

We also want to give drivers some new features like scheduling and create a Favorite Drivers list.  When searching for new rides, we will connect you to your favorite drivers first. 


What's Next

Panaroamer isn’t designed just for ride share services.  It is designed to open up the world around you by connecting you to people and companies with similar interests.  Panaroamer can help you find a date, find a plumber, a babysitter, great deals on food, and anything else you could imagine.  The best part is that all of these can be done within a single application.  You control how Panaroamer will work for you.  If you are hungry, create a food interest and see restaurants near you.  If you need some work done on your house, create a service interest and see qualified professionals near you.  And, of course, if you need a ride, choose the ride share option and see drivers near you.  With each search result you can see profiles of the people and companies along with their reviews from the others in our community.  Keep in touch with your friends, make new ones, you control how you use Panaroamer.  All of this is done dynamically.  Once you set up your interests, the system will seamlessly store all of your alerts for you to view at any time.

As a messaging system, there is something for everyone.  Our messaging service is not the typical one on one service.  Sure you can chat with your friends, new people with similar interests, or even a local business that has their customer support on our system, but there is much more you can do.  For businesses, you can send a single message to many of your customers that are currently in your area.  The customers have to express interest in your store and add you to their lists, but once that is done you can communicate freely.  These communications can be set to one way or two ways.  One way means the recipients cannot reply.  Two way means that they can.  For customers, you can receive messages from local business with special deals and offers.  You will only receive these messages if you express an interest in those companies or their products.  For service providers, our messaging system allows you to communicate with one, some, or all of your employees.  These messages can also be one way or two ways.

How Does Panaroamer Work for You:

Panaroamer is able to help with many different tasks in many different industries.  Here are some stories that illustrate typical use cases.

Freelance Driver:

If you are a freelance driver, Panaroamer connects you to potential riders.  You can see their profiles, destination, and the number of passengers before you agree to take their business.  Once you finish the ride, and you and your passenger agree that the service was great, then you can favorite each other.  This is the start of you building your client base!  As your client base grows, then you will get priority booking for your clients.  When they request rides and you are in their area, you will get matched first.  You will also appear on the top of their list for scheduled rides.  You can set your own prices so you can maximize your profits.  There is also a built in tipping system and that is all yours as well.

Limo/Taxi Services:

Panaroamer gives Limo and Taxi services the same benefits of most ride share systems, but with some added features.  As a dispatcher, you can see where your drivers are at any point.  They can contact you if there are any problems, like if they get a flat tire or have to stop for gas.  The dispatcher can also maintain communication with the customers to keep them apprised of the driver’s location and estimated time of arrival.  You can also keep track of your drivers and how they are doing with the built in review system.

Retailers:

If you are a retailer, Panaroamer offers you a unique targeted advertising system that will change the way you communicate with potential consumers.  It allows you to send any type of message to a customer in or near your store based on what they are interested in purchasing.  This will increase your opportunities to engage your customers and increase your opportunity to close a sale by offering special enticements.  These deals can be unique to a specific customer, to a specific product, to everyone, to everything.  To find out more details and information on this section, please contact us at info@panaroamer.com.

Private Contractors (Plumbers, Electricians, etc.)

As a private contractor, Panaroamer can help you manage your employees, establish a client base, and communicate with current customers.  Panaroamer allows you to instant message your clients to inform them of when you will arrive.  You can optionally share your location so they know you are on the way.  You will be able to also know where your employees are at any time and communicate with them instantly.  With our messaging service, you send a single message to all of your field workers.  This will help you maintain their locations and their work time.  Panaroamer will also save and store client information and build up your rolodex of customers. 

Dating and People Connection:

For those of you that are looking to find that special person or to just hang out with someone new, Panaroamer allows you to connect to anyone around you.  This, of course, assumes that both of you have similar interests and choose to connect.  You can ignore those requests that do not meet your expectations and chat with those that do.  You can also send private messages, images, or videos that can automatically be deleted after the person views it.

If you are new to town and just want to watch a game at a local bar, Panaroamer can connect you with others that have the same interests.  With our Quick Connect feature, you can join conversations or start your own conversation on any topic you choose.

Developer:

We need developers to come join our community and start creating your own applications.  You can devote your energy and efforts on your ideas, we’ll provide you with the technology.  If you have a game that needs the ability to connect players, we have the solution.  If you want to integrate instant messaging into your workout application, we have you covered.  If you need to add rich in depth analytics to your web services, we’ve done all of the heavy lifting.  We will assist you in implementing our APIs to provide a seamless service to your users all in a secure environment that only you can access.

We also need developers to help design new features and improve on current features.  Panaroamer is designed to be a community that grows together.  We are excited to provide a platform with limitless possibilities.

So come join us, and we will help you make your ideas a reality.

Who We Are

We are a Delaware Incorporated company that consist of an enthusiastic team of technically savvy entrepreneurs with more than 40 years of applied experience in startups, mobile, database, cloud, internetworking, and telecommunications technologies.  We have strong relationships within the software industry and can attract top-level talent.

The Impact

As a team we have been working on this project for more than two years and we are about four months from launching our ride share solution. We believe that once the public sees the power of our platform on the ride share side, we can then expose them to other products in the Panaroamer suite.

Our primary goal is to assist people in creating their own businesses, starting with a ride share business. For those already running their own businesses, we want to help them to better connect to new and current customers. Our system supports targeted ads that can reach anyone in the community who indicates a similar interest. You get access to our unique ride share system by way of features not available in any other rideshare system. You set your rates, you earn and keep your tips, you grow your client base, and you set your own schedules. Partner up with your friends and build your own rideshare corporation. The best part is that budgeting is easy. One monthly fee is all it takes! 

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking for funding to help our team focus solely on this project.  We will be strengthening our engineering team and infrastructure. The team will focus on completing the ride share solution.  We will then start building out our other solutions while continuing to update and improve our rideshare solution.  Additionally, we will add some new team members to assist with marketing and business development. We will also build a superior customer support team. Our community will grow by and for our users. As such, we will do everything possible to make sure they have the best experience possible. 

We are offering special perks to those who want to support us in our endeavor to challenge the status quo. For our friends with the entrepreneurial spirit, we are offering a perk that could open up some amazing possibilities. The first 5000 drivers that donate $1000 will receive lifetime access to our ride share services. You will never pay us another cent to use our system. No revenue splitting, no additional monthly fees!

For those that want to try it out for a few months, we are offering two free months of ride share if you prepay for the first month.

Other Ways You Can Help

Help us by spread the word about what we are doing. After we launch, be on the lookout for referral contests!

Please contact us at info@panaroamer.com and share your thoughts, feedback, or any questions.  We would love to hear from you.

most ride share systems, but with some added features.  As a dispatcher, you can see where your
drivers are at any point.  They can
contact you if there are any problems, like if they get a flat tire or have to
stop for gas.  The dispatcher can also
maintain communication with the customers to keep them apprised of the driver’s
location and estimated time of arrival. 
You can also keep track of your drivers and how they are doing with the
built in review system.Retailers:
If you are a retailer, Panaroamer offers you a unique targeted
advertising system that will change the way you communicate with potential
consumers.  It allows you to send any type of message to a customer in or
near your store based on what they are interested in purchasing.  This
will increase your opportunities to engage your customers and increase your
opportunity to close a sale by offering special enticements.  These deals can be unique to a specific
customer, to a specific product, to everyone, to everything.  To find out
more details and information on this section, please contact us at info@panaroamer.com.


Private Contractors (Plumbers, Electricians, etc.)

As a private contractor, Panaroamer can help you manage your
employees, establish a client base, and communicate with current
customers.  Panaroamer allows you to
instant message your clients to inform them of when you will arrive.  You can optionally share your location so
they know you are on the way.  You will
be able to also know where your employees are at any time and communicate with
them instantly.  With our messaging
service, you send a single message to all of your field workers.  This will help you maintain their locations
and their work time.  Panaroamer will
also save and store client information and build up your rolodex of customers.  

Dating and People Connection:

For those of you that are looking to find that special
person or to just hang out with someone new, Panaroamer allows you to connect
to anyone around you.  This, of course,
assumes that both of you have similar interests and choose to connect.  You can ignore those requests that do not
meet your expectations and chat with those that do.  You can also send private messages, images,
or videos that can automatically be deleted after the person views it.

If you are new to town and just want to watch a game at a
local bar, Panaroamer can connect you with others that have the same
interests.  With our Quick Connect
feature, you can join conversations or start your own conversation on any topic
you choose.
Developer: 

We need developers to come join our community and start
creating your own applications.  You can
devote your energy and efforts on your ideas, we’ll provide you with the
technology.  If you have a game that
needs the ability to connect players, we have the solution.  If you want to integrate instant messaging
into your workout application, we have you covered.  If you need to add rich in depth analytics
to your web services, we’ve done all of the heavy lifting.  We will assist you in implementing our APIs
to provide a seamless service to your users all in a secure environment that
only you can access.
We also need developers to help design new features and
improve on current features.  Panaroamer
is designed to be a community that grows together.  We are excited to provide a platform with
limitless possibilities.
So come join us, and we will help you make your ideas a
reality.

Who
We Are
We are a Delaware Incorporated
company that consist of an enthusiastic team of technically savvy
entrepreneurs with more than 40 years of applied experience in startups, mobile,
database, cloud, internetworking, and telecommunications technologies.  We
have strong relationships within the software industry and can attract
top-level talent.The
Impact
As a team we have been working on
this project for more than two years and we are about four months from launching our ride share solution. We believe that once the public sees the power of our platform on the ride
share side, we can then expose them to other products in the Panaroamer suite. 
Our primary goal is to assist people
in creating their own businesses, starting with a ride share business. For
those already running their own businesses, we want to help them to better
connect to new and current customers. Our system supports targeted ads that can
reach anyone in the community who indicates a similar interest. You get access
to our unique ride share system by way of features not available in any other
rideshare system. You set your rates, you earn and keep your tips, you grow
your client base, and you set your own schedules. Partner up with your friends
and build your own rideshare corporation. The best part is that budgeting is
easy. One monthly fee is all it takes!  What
We Need & What You Get
We are looking for funding to help
our team focus solely on this project.  We will be strengthening our
engineering team and infrastructure. The team will focus on completing the ride share solution.  We will then start building out our other solutions while continuing to update and improve our rideshare solution.  Additionally, we will add
some new team members to assist with marketing and business development. We
will also build a superior customer support team. Our community will grow by
and for our users. As such, we will do everything possible to make sure they
have the best experience possible.  
We are offering special perks to
those who want to support us in our endeavor to challenge the status quo. For
our friends with the entrepreneurial spirit, we are offering a perk that could
open up some amazing possibilities. The first 5000 drivers that donate $1000
will receive lifetime access to our ride share services. You will never pay us
another cent to use our system. No revenue splitting, no additional monthly
fees!
For those that want to try it out
for a few months, we are offering two free months of ride share if you prepay
for the first month.
Other
Ways You Can Help
Help us by spread the word about what we are doing. After we launch, be on
the lookout for referral contests!
Please contact us at info@panaroamer.com and share your thoughts, feedback, or any questions.  We would love to hear from you.

story:
We match artists with candles, candles with causes, and causes with people.

MATCH + LIGHT was inspired by candles hand-made by my mom for my supper club, ATE 3 FOUR, here in Chicago. These candles sparked incredible conversations at our dinner table convincing us that candles have the power to DO MORE.

5 Things About MATCH + LIGHT:

  • We’re a mother-daughter team on a mission to DO GOOD with candles. 
  • Each month, we release a limited edition candle that SUPPORTS A CAUSE.
  • The first series of candles will support a cause we care about. CANCER. 
  • The next series will support a cause YOU care about. 
  • Each candle features artwork from INDEPENDENT ARTISTS, hand-poured using the highest quality sustainable ingredients.
Our Goal:
We are ready to shed some light on cancer. We have sourced all our materials locally and the fragrance has been tested. Now we just need $5k to fund the production of the first series of Match + Light candles to support cancer.

To make our candles, we partnered with local candle maker, Chicago Candle Factory to hand pour each and every candle.

We took the money typically wasted on a fancy box and reinvested that into a custom satin black glass that is reusable so it's better for the environment. 

Each candle, features artwork from independent artists because we believe that beautiful art sparks conversation.

The candle itself is made from a natural soy wax and is double the size of the average candle you typically buy in a boutique store. 



Together with your help, we can make a difference and impact the lives of many living with Cancer. With nine in ten US homes having candles as decor, we see our candles as the perfect way to leave a lasting impression, bringing art into people's homes as well as sparking meaningful conversations for a cause we all care about. 
At Match + Light we have set a goal to impact 50,000 lives in 2016 with our candles for a cause. Contribute today and join us. 


So why did we choose cancer? For us it's personal.
My mom has lost both her sisters and her mother to cancer. With Match + Light we realized there was more we could do to help families living with cancer so that is where we are starting.

For each of our candles we partner with a cause. For our first candle, we are thrilled to partner with Be the Match® . They help blood cancer patients find their life-saving donor match. $4 from the purchase price of every one of our Be the Match limited-edition candles will help reach more donors and find more matches.




Special Thank You

We couldn’t have launched this effort without a helping hand from some incredible humans who deserve a special shout out.

To my mom : my business partner, my hero. Thanks for being such an inspiration and for challenging me to do some good. I'm thrilled to embark on this journey with you.

Aunt Susan : for her spot on guidance throughout every step of this project.

Dr. Kelly Page : our business coach extraordinaire was the peanut butter to our jelly when it came to fine tuning our messaging. 

Lisa Diederich : our favorite Chicago photographer who helped us established our visual branding for our launch.

Jimmy @ Robotoaster : our favorite videographer in Chicago believes in us so much he squeezed us into his very tight schedule.

Nicole Yeary & the MsTech Community : Both Indiegogo and MsTech have an interest in supporters female entrepreneurs, so thank you to MsTech for supporting us as the first MsTech members on IndieGogo.

Troy Henikoff Troy Henikoff : For introducing us to a real-life angel, Jonny Imerman. Jonny gave us his critical feedback and together we decided to dedicate the first series to cancer.

Jessica Tenuta, Suzanne Muchin, Lindsay Mullen : For being a critical sounding board when we needed quick unbiased feedback.

Pat Conlee : for making the intro to the amazing Maggie and Liz at Be the Match. It has been an honor to work with Be the Match and their incredible team.

Colin McGuire & Alida Miranda-Wolff : for being my resident crowdfunding experts and sharing your wisdom with me.


Risks & Challenges

No new venture comes without risk. We’ve worked for the last couple months to secure trusted partners for local sourcing and manufacturing. When manufacturing there is always a chance of delays. We will do our best to communicate any delays. We have forecasted our shipping to take place at the end of May and hope to under promise and over-deliver. A quality product is nothing without happy customers and prompt support, so we pledge to deliver just that.  

========================================

Citations:

Candle Icon by Shelagh McLellan from the Noun Project

Cancer Facts shared in the video courtesy of Be The Match 

Candle Facts via National Candle Association (Yes, this exists.)

story:
BetGladiator.com is here to present valuable services so that bettors on sports don’t have to seek alternative resources. Having the right tools and knowledge you will get the necessary experience to become a professional punters and make a solid income for your budget. Our perspective is independent and honest, that is, unlike others we do not want you to convince you that you’ll become a millionaire overnight. The only thing we can offer you is reliable support and expert advice, which comes together with an authority of people who care about you and your results. 

We believe in making a difference. In our customers’ eyes,BetGladiator.com stands for value for money, quality, innovation and a sense of competitive challenge. We value the relationships we build with every client. Our service is a very personal business, closely tied to a client’s sense of confidence and well being. Our aim is to increase their confidence in us, as it is to increase performance. This often means making the effort to guide our clients through periods of uncertainty, and demonstrating how we can even turn market uncertainty to their advantage. This requires a certain dedication to relationship building, and scrupulous transparency at every stage. Just one reason why our clients stay with us for a long time. Understanding our clients needs means ensuring that they are as comfortable with our investment strategies as we are. Our team are here to advise you and help maximize your earnings across our complete range of industry leading products using all our provided picks , so be sure that our primary aim is to help you.

In order to achieve our goal we need money so we can fund our advertising campaign and more people to invest and benefit out of our knowledge, within our website we help people to invest their money in smart way and increase their earning. We advise people and in exchange we help them to make profit out sports bettings, including setting their buget, manage their betting accounts and help  them to have a profitable investment.

story:
A Special thanks to the people that gave to help the children. Unfortunately, our goals were under met. I will continue the efforts to help the children with other fundraisers. Eventually, the children goals will be met and it will be a happy day for the children. 

_____________________________________________

Please help our Challenge to buy hypoallergenic powdered milk, fresh food, and safe mattresses that properly fit the crib.

I will personally buy the powdered milk, food, and mattresses and bring them to the children. By doing it this way, we know the children benefit from your gifts and support. I will also send photos and a personal thank you email to everyone for you help and support.

This is a fundraiser for the FRIENDS FOR ALL CHILDREN FOUNDATION.
The children at this orphanage have a very special need.

There are about 30 orphan children.  Their ages range from 1 to 3 years old. 
They are in 3 small houses, with about 10 children in each house.

I asked Saovanee (the director of the orphanage), "What do the children need the most?'
Her reply was, ‘The children need hypoallergenic powdered milk and fresh food.’

I also noticed that the mattresses in the cribs were too small.  
Sometimes, the babies roll off the mattress and get stuck between the mattress and the steel bars. This is potential hazardous!

If enough money is raised, I would like to buy the proper size mattresses for the cribs.  It would make the cribs a lot safer for the babies.

Only with your help will this fundraiser be successful!

Your giving and support makes a difference to these children.  
Also, please help by sharing this on your Facebook and other social media.
More exposure will help us reach our goal!
Thank you for helping the children.

What You Get

For your gift to the children, we would like to give you a Thai String wristband bracelet.

The Thai String wristband bracelets are common to Thailand. The real name in Thai is ‘Sai Sin’ Bracelet.  It is believed to bring the wearer luck and fortune. For luck in travels, for luck in endeavors and for luck in old age (respectively).


For your gift of $25

You get a Thai String wristband bracelet and a Special Edition Uncirculated 10 baht collectors coin.


Why I became interested in helping orphan children in Thailand.

A Thai lady in the Northern part of Thailand that turned her small house into an orphanage, was telling the story of how one little girl became a homeless orphan.  It was one of the saddest stories I had ever heard.

The little 6 year old Thai girl was found in a small village in North Thailand, close to the boarder of Myanmar.  She was found walking aimlessly down the street hungry and confused. 

Her father, which was the only income provider, was killed a few months earlier.  Her mother, which was her only family left,  had died in her bed from of a sickness (because of no medical treatment) 7 days prior of finding the little girl. 

When her mother died, the little girl, not knowing what to do, left the hut and started walking down the street. 

She had been wondering on the streets for several days, before she was found and brought to the orphanage.  After being fed and cared for by the orphanage, the little girl regained her strength and survived.

After hearing the little girls story, I realized how important these small orphanages are to children that need emergency help.  Often, these small house orphanages don’t have much financial help and rely on the local Thai people, which are usually poor themselves.

My Thailand experience.

I was born and raised in the USA. At age 54 (5 years ago), I moved to Thailand and

volunteered as an English language teacher. 

Although, Thailand is called the land of Smiles and is a wonderful tourists destination, many Thai children have yet experienced a smile.  As I explored the less traveled areas of Thailand, I saw many heart breaking situations that changed my life.  

There are many challenges that Thai children are born into.  Just like there parents were born into, and the generation before them were born into. 

Some of the challenges for the children are so overwhelming, that outside help is the only way to break the cycle of failure, poverty, and hopelessness.

Sometimes, normal childhood experiences and basic education are often taken from the children of poor families.

One day, I stopped to have lunch in a small restaurant about 20 miles north of Bangkok.  I was surprised when a 12 year old girl took my order.  It was in the afternoon durning school hours. 

I ask the lady restaurant owner why the little girl was not in school. She told me the little girls story of the hard times that her mother & father were going through.  They had came across the border from Cambodia into Thailand, trying to start a new life.  The 12 year old girl had approached her looking for work to help buy food for the family.

The lady restaurant owner told me it was very difficult for her to hire the little girl because, she had a young daughter the same age.  She continued to explain to me, that by hiring the little girl, she could watch her and keep her safe from the sex trade and other things that could be harmful to her.  

I was hurtful to see the little girl working full time at 12 years old.  Knowing that her childhood and school education was over and the responsibilities of an adult life had begun. 

In my mind, I ask myself, ‘How can I make this world better?  The only answer I came up with is, changing one child’s life... is a good place to start.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please, help the children by sharing this fundraiser on your Facebook and other social media. Everyone at the FRIENDS FOR ALL CHILDREN FOUNDATION
thanks you for your support.
Thank you for helping the children.

The lady restaurant owner told me it was very difficult for her to hire the little girl because, she had a young daughter the same age.  She continued to explain to me, that by hiring the little girl, she could watch her and keep her safe from the sex trade and other things that could be harmful to her.

In my mind, I ask myself, ‘How can I make this world better?  The only answer I came up with is, changing one child’s life... is a good place to start.

Other Ways You Can Help 
Please, help the children by sharing this fundraiser on your Facebook and other social media. Everyone at the FRIENDS FOR ALL CHILDREN FOUNDATIONthanks you for your support.Thank you for helping the children.

story:
MY  BACKGROUND

My name is Frank Swai born and raised in Roo village, Hai district in Kilimanjaro region Tanzania. I got a chance to get my first degree of "Bachelor of science in Hospitality and Tourism management “at Tumaini University at Stefano branch in Moshi Memorial University College. After completing my studies, i shifted to Arusha the famous tourist region in Tanzania. I have been doing part time tourists jobs in Arusha. I have now decided to totally live in this region as it is part of my focused career in self-development and the society.

Map of Tanzania showing tourists attractions

MY CAMPAIGN AND WHY IT IS IMPORTANT

  While still studying, I tried to think much on what to do after my studies because it is difficult to get employment opportunities as there are few chances compared to applicants. So i decided to start my small tourists company in which i can deal with tourists who visits Tanzania in the National parks and the highest mountain in Africa, Mount Kilimanjaro. Commencing a tourists company is very expensive if someone lacks sponsors. As the things necessary needed to start the company is having enough vehicles to carry tourists, Insurance, Workers, license. I have created a website that has enough information about Tanzania’s tourism business. All i requires now is to advertise my company, registration for my company, buying some vehicles which I required to have so as to be considered and qualify for registration  for which is very expensive. What I can ask from you is your support and assistance in making my business prosper.

The importance of this campaign;

1.    The tourists that i will bring in Tanzania will lift the nation's economy through giving foreign currencies.

2.  My society will be developed through employment opportunities given by my company.

3.  Hotels and Lodges will earn income as tourists prefer living in hotels during their visits in Tanzania.

4.  Many tourists like doing cultural programs, so even orphanage centers will be benefited by my company.

5.  The business will also intensify International relationship of Tanzania with other nations.

6.  My tourism business also stimulate the growth of other sector such as agriculture, many tourists likes to learn about agriculture in Tanzania when they come for a visit, taste the Tanzanian food which are traditional made.

Elephant at Selous Game Reserve (Beside the Rufiji River)


REASONS AS TO WHY MY PROJECT IS VALUABLE TO DONORS AND THE WORLD

This project is very essential to donors and the World at large, as it will intensify International relationship between Tanzania and the tourists who will visit our country. But even sponsors will get time to visit and witness Tanzanian tourist’s attractions.

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

The following are the risks and challenges starting this business;

1.  The tourism business is very competitive Worldwide and more effort is needed to master this.

2.  Language barrier is another challenge, as for different nations use different languages like French, English, German, Italian, Japanese, and Chinese among other languages.

3.  Another challenge is how to get partners or agents who would support the business.

4.  Vehicles for transporting tourists.

5.  Advertisement is very expensive.

Sample of Safari Itinerary which you can win and enjoy the safari with us!

Highlights

Tarangire National Park, Lake Manyara National Park, Serengeti National Park, Ngorongoro Crater

Itinerary

Day 1:  Arusha, Tanzania 

You will be collected from the airport and transferred to your lodge in the forests outside Arusha. Depending on your arrival time, you will have an opportunity to explore the lodge grounds, go for a dip in the swimming pool or partake in any of the offered additional activities available.

Accommodation:  Moivaro Coffee Plantation Lodge or similar (lodge accommodation)

Meals:

Dinner:  At Moivaro Coffee Plantation Lodge or similar

Day 2:Tarangire National Park, Tanzania 

Today we head towards the Tarangire National Park for lunch and an afternoon game drive. Tarangire is well known for its huge elephant population and baobab trees. It forms the centre of an annual migratory cycle that includes up to 3000 elephants, 25,000 wildebeest and 30,000 zebras.

Accommodation:  Camping at Fanaka Campsite or similar (dome tent)

Meals:

Breakfast:   At Moivaro Coffee Plantation Lodge or similar

Lunch:  Picnic Lunch from Moivaro Coffee Plantation Lodge or similar

Dinner:  Prepared by our cook

Day 3:  Manyara National Park, Tanzania   

After coffee we head towards Lake Manyara National Park for an early morning game drive. This spectacular park is located at the north-western corner of Lake Manyara, a hallow soda lake, which lies at the foot of the Great Rift Valley’s western escarpment. Manyara NP is not only known for its large flocks of flamingos, but also for the elusive tree climbing lions.

Accommodation:  Camping at Fanaka Campsite or similar (dome tent)

Meals:

Breakfast:   At the Camp

Lunch:  Picnic lunch collected from the camp

Dinner:  At the Camp

Day 4:  Lake Manyara – Serengeti National Park, Tanzania   

Our journey starts shortly after breakfast with a scenic drive up the Rift Valley escarpment to Serengeti National Park. You will be crossing Ngorongoro Conservation Area Authority and we make a brief stop at Olduvai Gorge and the museum which documents the discovery of 1.8 million year old human-like fossils. Thereafter we head for the Serengeti National Park, game driving along the way to the campsite.

Accommodation:  Camping at Seronera Public Campsite or similar (dome tent)

Meals:

Breakfast:   At the Camp

Lunch:  Picnic lunch collected from the camp

Dinner:  At the Camp

Day 5:  Serengeti National Park, Tanzania 

Today you will enjoy a full day game viewing exploring the endless plains of this magnificent place. The Seronera River is the life blood of the Serengeti in the dry season and this area is renowned for great game viewing all year round and is especially popular for sightings of the elusive leopard.

Accommodation:  Camping at Seronera Public Campsite or similar (dome tent)

Meals:

Breakfast:   At the Camp

Lunch:  Picnic lunch collected from the camp

Dinner:  At the Camp

Day 6:Ngorongoro National Park, Tanzania 

We take an early breakfast at the camp and then head to the spectacular Ngorongoro Crater. On arrival we go through the registration process and descend to the floor of the world’s largest unbroken caldera for the most wonderful day of game viewing. We will have lunch at the designated picnic site at the side of the hippo pool and continue with a game drive as we drive up the crater rim for overnight.

Accommodation:  Camping at Panorama Campsite or similar (dome tent)

Meals:

Breakfast:   At the Camp

Lunch:  Picnic lunch collected from the camp

Dinner:  At the Camp

Day 7:  Ngorongoro – Arusha, Tanzania 

After breakfast we explore the colourful town of Mto-wa-Mbu for some last minute pictures and curio shopping. Afterwards we head to Arusha where the tour will end at our offices. We hope to welcome you again on one of our African adventures!

Meals:

Breakfast:  At the Camp 

END OF TOUR



Pre – departure information

Departure

The Tanzania Wildlife Safaris departs from the African Tulip Hotel in Arusha. When arriving in Arusha on day one, you will be picked up from the airport and transferred to your hotel. Should you arrive prior to day one, pre-tour accommodation can be arranged and you will be picked up from your hotel on the morning of day.

In the evening of first day of your safari, there will be a pre-departure meeting presented by your guide at your accommodation. It is imperative that all clients attend this meeting so as not to miss out on any critical information.

Whilst it is our every intention to adhere to the above mentioned itinerary, there may on occasion be a necessity to make alterations in order to make the tour more enjoyable or practical.  Therefore please treat the itinerary as a guide only.

Transport

Steppe Dogs Adventures uses fully equipped customized 8-seater 4x4 safari vehicles, Toyota Land Cruisers or other appropriate vehicles with comfortable seating, large windows for game viewing and a music system. The vehicles are fully air-conditioned and equipped with pop-up roofs to facilitate the best game viewing. All luggages, besides hand luggage and photo equipment, are carried on the vehicle roof rack to ensure maximum comfort in the vehicle.

Traveling Times & Distances

All travelling times are affected by road conditions, border crossings, detours and weather conditions, therefore on certain days travelling times may be longer than anticipated especially where there is a lot of distance to be covered.  Please keep in mind that the time it takes to travel 100 km in your home country is not equivalent to the time it takes to travel 100 km on African roads, therefore we encourage you to sit back and enjoy the spectacular scenery Africa has to offer.  Where possible additional stops will be made to ensure you’re travelling comfort at all times.

Accommodation

We make use of designated campsites, either within a National Park or on the banks of a river, or other places of interest. All campsites have shared ablution facilities with showers, flushing toilets and running water (unless otherwise specified in the detailed itinerary). Steppe Dogs Adventures tries to avoid crowded campsites and brings you to secluded spots, often supported by the local community. We make use of 3-person dome tents with the following measurements: 2.5 m x 2. 5 m x 1.8 m and accommodate two clients per tent. All tents are fitted with mosquito-screed windows and doors. In addition, we provide 5 cm thick sleeping mattresses. Sleeping bags can be hired at an additional fee of US$ 30 per sleeping bag for the entire tour.

For the lodge safari, we make use of typical, mid-range African standard lodge accommodation. Accommodation is situated either in national parks, on the banks of a river, or in other places of interest. The accommodation will be a mix of lodges, chalets and tented camps, all with en-suite facilities. Some properties are equipped with swimming pools and/or bar areas.

Spending money

Clients are advised to bring enough money to cover the purchase of curios, tips for the guide and additional entertainment. US Dollars and Tanzanian Shilling are the most practical and convenient currencies.

Meals

All meals will be prepared by your guide, either around a campfire in the evening or at a picnic site for lunch. Please advise us of any special dietary requirements in advance.

First Aid Kit

Our guides are trained in basic first aid and the vehicle is equipped with a medical aid kit. Preventative Malaria medication should be taken before the trip and throughout its duration and it is advisable to consult a doctor prior to departure. Yellow Fever vaccinations are compulsory – please contact your Travel Clinic before departure.

Luggage:

Maximum baggage allowance: 12 kg. Steppe Dogs Adventures Tanzania stipulates this luggage allowance, as an overloaded vehicle is a danger to both the clients and the guide. This does not include photographic equipment and a small daypack. Please bring soft-sided luggage (e.g. a backpack or soft barrel bag), not a suitcase. Don't bring too much clothing, as there are washing opportunities along the way. Please adhere to the allowance specified as space for luggage is limited.

Insurance:

It is compulsory for all travellers to have insurance covering their personal requirements, medical expenses and personal possessions. This is to be arranged before leaving your home country. Steppe Dogs Adventures has comprehensive public liability insurance.

Packing:

Shorts  Track suit  walking shoes

Light trousers/jeans  Swimming costume  Sandals

T-shirts  Sun hat  Windbreaker

Warm clothes (May – August)  Long-sleeved shirts   Camera

Torch  Mosquito protection 

UV protection   Spare batteries

Visas:

The onus is on the client to organize all visas required to visit Tanzania prior to departure.


Detailed Information on Areas Visited

Tanzania

A land of plains, lakes and mountains, with a narrow, low-lying coastal belt, Tanzania is East Africa's largest country and also one of its most diverse.  Tanzania is home for more than 100 different ethnic groups, mostly of Bantu origin, each with its own language and customs.

Tanzania has one of the largest and wildest animal populations in the world.  Wildebeest, monkey, antelope, lion, cheetah, crocodile, gazelle, and flamingo - you name them. Blessed with some of the world's largest game reserves, the country also has one of the highest concentrations of elephant, buffalo, hippo, wild dog and chimpanzee.

Its spectacular topography includes The Great Rift Valley, Mt Kilimanjaro and famous parks such as the Serengeti and the wonderful Ngorongoro Crater.

Offshore are idyllic islands with beautiful palm-fringed beaches and turquoise seas that surround pristine coral reefs.  The archaeological treasures of Tanzania include hominid fossils, which are more than 300 million years old.  Tanzanian music and dance dominates much of East Africa.  Strong in rhythm and renowned for hard-hitting lyrics, the country's Swahili-based sounds are kept very much alive by a thriving dance-band scene.  Nyama choma (barbecued meat) has taken over in a big way, especially in restaurants with attached bars.  But on the coast, on Zanzibar and Pemba islands, there's a decent range of traditional Swahili dishes based on seafood.


Recorded history begins around 1800, when the Masai warrior tribes were migrating from Kenya to Tanzania.  It wasn't until the middle of the 18th century that Arab traders and slaves dared venture into Masai territory in the country's wild interior.  European explorers began arriving in earnest in the mid-19th century, the most famous being Stanley and Livingstone.  The famous phrase ‘Dr Livingstone, I presume’, stems from the duo's meeting at Ujiji on Lake Tanganyika. Tanganyika won independence in 1961 with Julius Nyerere as the country's first president. Nyerere, whose secret ingredient was radical socialism, gained widespread respect and is seen as one of the most influential leaders Africa has ever had.  Zanzibar was stuck for another two years, after which the mainland forged a union comprising Zanzibar and the nearby island of Pemba. Thus Tanzania was born.

There is a wide range of optional activities to make your experience in Tanzania absolutely unforgettable.  Some great views can be experienced while floating in a hot-air balloon over the Serengeti.  While swimming with dolphins is all the rage on the island of Zanzibar.  Snorkelling and scuba diving is equally popular due to the world-class coral reefs off nearby Pemba and Mafia

Tarangire National Park

The Tarangire National Park covers 2,600km² and habits the highest concentration of wildlife outside the Serengeti ecosystem. Here, you can watch huge herds of wildebeest, eland, zebra, buffalo, impala, gazelle and elephant moving through the undulating countryside and taking a rest under a vast number of baobab trees, or drinking at the lagoons and the rivers. Remember not to just look on the ground though, but have a look at the branches of the trees for lion, leopard and pythons or the amazing 550 bird species also found in this area.


Lake Manyara National Park:

Lake Manyara National Park sits at the base of the Great Rift Valley escarpment and is one of the most scenic parks in Tanzania. There are stunning views of the park from every direction. From the east, the Rift Valley escarpment emerges on the horizon with the lake forming a glistening background. On the southern side of the park, you will find the hot springs of Maji Moto, which are about 60ºC. At the top of the escarpment from the west, the park stretches across a ribbon of green with the lake shining in the sun. Like most Rift Valley lakes, the water is alkaline. This attracts vast flocks of flamingos, which form pink foam against a silver background of water. Altogether, this area offers beautiful views as you take in the massive lake with its silver shimmer and surrounding vegetation.

The major landmark is the spectacular rift wall, where the plains give way to cultivated uplands of Mbululand. Measuring only 330km2 (of which the lake occupies 230km2) and located only 130km from Arusha, this park often gets day visitors, who come to enjoy the endless views and variety of mammals, reptiles and birds, as well as the varied vegetation, flora and fauna.

Animals found in the area include zebra, elephant, hippo, monkey, wildebeest (gnu), waterbuck, warthog, gazelle, impala, buffalo, warthog, hyena, baboon and giraffe. Manyara is also known for its tree-climbing lions. These majestic animals find shelter from the heat and biting flies in the branches of trees and can easily kill buffalo, which is far greater in weight and size. There are also over 350 species of bird life, with a variety of local species inhabiting the forest and bush, including pelicans that waddle around next to short grasses on the shore of the lake.

Serengeti National Park:

Serengeti, which sprawls across 14.763 km2 (5.757 miles2), is Tanzania’s largest and most famous national park. The chief herbivore of Serengeti is the wildebeest (gnu) of which there are up to two million. The amazing annual migration of wildebeest herds is one of the biggest attractions of the Serengeti. It begins at the Serengeti National Park near the Kenyan border, when huge herds of these animals, head for greener pastures in Kenya.  Starting in April each year, they migrate across the Serengeti's southern plains accompanied by zebra, antelope, gazelle, lion and tourists! The park is also famous for its lions, which can be tracked due to the fact that many have collars fitted with transmitters, as well as cheetah and large herds of giraffe.


Ngorongoro Conservation Area:

Being one of the largest calderas in the world, 20 km (12.4 miles)-wide, 600 m (1.968ft) tall, with a variety of animals and vegetation, Ngorongoro Crater is one of Tanzania’s most visited areas. The vegetation includes grasslands, swamps, forests, salt-pans, as well as a freshwater lake and has been compared to Noah's Ark or the Garden of Eden. 


You will have no trouble finding lion, elephant, rhino, buffalo and many of the plains herbivores such as wildebeest (gnu), Thomson's gazelle, zebra and reedbuck, as well as thousands of flamingos wading in the shallows of Lake Magadi, the soda lake on the floor of the crater. Within the steep walls of the crater you will find considerable movement of animals and you may well come across local Masai tribesmen (who have grazing rights here), tending their cattle.

Maasai at Ngorongoro 

The Maasai of Tanzania are an indigenous pastoral society with a rich and vibrant oral history.

Maasai

Their traditional knowledge, often narrated in the form of folktales, songs, stories, poetry, and chants, contains a wide-range of knowledge about traditional medicine, grazing practices, landscape ecology, the behavior of animals, livestock management, and the gathering of wild plant foods.

Maasai pastoralists represent the highest degree of pastoral specialization in the Eastern-Sudanic region of East Africa. Maasai peoples, however, also combine livestock herding with other economic activities such as cultivation, trade, and gathering. Because of their dependence on natural resources to sustain livestock and human populations (such as natural watering sites, grazing areas, agricultural land, and drought reserves), many Maasai groups that historically depended on community grazing structures and local, opportunistic agriculture suffered economically when they were forced onto smaller parcels of settled land. This conflict arose as colonial, and later local governments began instituting land reform programs that transformed Maasai lands in Kenya and Tanzania into group ranches, privatized settler farms, national parks, game reserves, and hunting areas. In 1911, Maasai lands in Kenya were reduced by 60 percent when the British evicted them to make room for settler ranches, subsequently confining them to present-day Kajiado and Narok districts. Maasai lands were further enclosed to allow for the creation of game parks, including Amboseli, Nairobi, and Masai Mara in Kenya and the Serengeti/Ngorongoro Conservation Area in Tanzania. Ndagala states that were the colonial and post-colonial eviction of the pastoralists from some of their best grazing lands were rationalized to protect the wildlife. The transfer of these lands has served to enclose many pastoral and semi agricultural groups onto parcels of lands that are unsuitable for either semi-nomadic pastoralism or agriculture at a sustainable level. 

Maasai woman showing hospitality to her visitor by covering her by Maasai shuka. Support us and will send you one shuka.
After independence, Tanzania implemented a socialist policy of villagazation, a program to promote sustainability, development, and nationalism. In Maasai areas, this meant that people were physically resettled into bomas, a circular cluster of homes. The bomas, which were formerly kin settlements, were now neighborly groupings of individual families. In 1976, the government officially resettled the Maasai in Monduli and gave them a maximum of three acres of land each to farm (Ndagala: 1982). Whereas the Maasai previously thought of grazing fields as a community resource (Ndagala 1992), each family now owned its own plot of land. In the shift to a more sedentary lifestyle, the Maasai in Monduli Juu became a pastoralist community where they cultivated both maize and beans and kept extensive herds of livestock. In this sense, they were likened to ilmeek, outsiders or non-Maasai, whom they had formerly despised because they did not value grass, a significant source of life for pastoralists (Galaty 1981:4; Hodgson 1999). In the words of one woman in Eluai Village, “There used to be so many cows that the grass would not reach the door of the house; now there is [unused] grass everywhere.” 

Dance with Maasai tribe, see their unique house building and learn their ways of life from their elders!
This subsequently placed the Maasai at odds with their environment, both culturally and economically. Without livestock, a Maasai male is presented with many difficulties. These difficulties include the inability to obtain sufficient food, lack of money to buy grains, inability to put up a good house, and if unmarried, he may not be able to attract a wife. Thus, the privatization of land ultimately increased the relative poverty of those living in Eluai and led to a more individualistic view of maintaining the environment. Instead of protecting the communal character of grazing lands, those who cultivated farms destroyed grass; an act seen as an aggression against Engai. As a result, trees, which were formerly regarded as objects of refuge, ritual, and healing, became capital to be owned and used or sold in the same way livestock once was, by whoever held the land they grew on. 
1. Engai is the Maasai name for God. In the Maasai language, en- is the feminine prefix and God is associated with femininity; as a mother creator and protector of all natural things.

After long safari on our national parks or from Kilimanjaro climbing extend your trip to Zanzibar where you will spend your 3 or 4 days on beaches and learn some Zanzibar cultures.
