story:
Short Summary

What is missing from the above picture?  PLANTS!!!!!!!!

OUR AIM: 5 Indigenous plants at each of the properties,

This project is being initiated b the Kommetjie Environmental Awareness Group (KEAG). A Non-Profit Organisation that has been actively involved in environmental projects on the Cape Peninsula (South Africa) since 1991. Over this time KEAG has won numerous Environmental Awards and has been involved in many community upliftment projects.

Mountain View is located on the southern Cape Peninsula about 40km south of Cape Town. The residents have been waiting for twenty years to get their promised houses from the government and have been living in shacks in the interim. Finally, the houses are ready and the people are taking ownership. In a positive departure from previous site and service schemes, the houses have been cladded with locally cut sandstone making them aesthetically pleasing.

One thing missing however is gardens. The community is impoverished and cannot afford to buy plants. KEAG has begun a campaign to plant 5 indigenous plants in each garden at the new development. These plants will not only be aesthetically pleasing but would also help with the serious erosion and run-off problems currently being experienced. The project would also bring the community together and help create a real feeling of upliftment from the old shacks.

 What We Need & What You Get

On completion of the new development there will be 500 different homes. Our aim is to plant at least 5 indigenous plants in each garden. This will include two trees, two shrubs and some form of ground cover. The owners of the properties will help with the planting and take ownership of the maintenance and watering.

15 dollars will cover the cost of a planting at one home.

KEAG will also try to secure further plant donations from local nurseries and the local government. If the goal is not reached we will plant whatever we can and continue with the campaign until we have 5 in every garden......
story_txt:
Short Summary


 What is missing from the above picture?  PLANTS!!!!!!!!
OUR AIM: 5 Indigenous plants at each of the properties,
This project is being initiated b the Kommetjie Environmental Awareness Group (KEAG). A Non-Profit Organisation that has been actively involved in environmental projects on the Cape Peninsula (South Africa) since 1991. Over this time KEAG has won numerous Environmental Awards and has been involved in many community upliftment projects.
Mountain View is located on the southern Cape Peninsula about 40km south of Cape Town. The residents have been waiting for twenty years to get their promised houses from the government and have been living in shacks in the interim. Finally, the houses are ready and the people are taking ownership. In a positive departure from previous site and service schemes, the houses have been cladded with locally cut sandstone making them aesthetically pleasing. 
One thing missing however is gardens. The community is impoverished and cannot afford to buy plants. KEAG has begun a campaign to plant 5 indigenous plants in each garden at the new development. These plants will not only be aesthetically pleasing but would also help with the serious erosion and run-off problems currently being experienced. The project would also bring the community together and help create a real feeling of upliftment from the old shacks.
 What We Need & What You Get
 On completion of the new development there will be 500 different homes. Our aim is to plant at least 5 indigenous plants in each garden. This will include two trees, two shrubs and some form of ground cover. The owners of the properties will help with the planting and take ownership of the maintenance and watering. 15 dollars will cover the cost of a planting at one home. KEAG will also try to secure further plant donations from local nurseries and the local government. If the goal is not reached we will plant whatever we can and continue with the campaign until we have 5 in every garden......

story:
Artistic Taste 7, began as a private catering company in the Bay Area of California focusing primarily on Food Services. Many years ago, Chef Rashad envisioned combining his talents in culinary arts with  helping his community and being apart of the positive change in this generation. Being raised in an environment where crime was embraced and Education seemed to be dismissed,  Chef Rashad chose his Passion for Food over the Streets, although he contributes many of his creative menu ideas and personable customer service skills to what he learned while in the "streets" as an adolescent. He is a figure of hope for the young person struggling to lead a positive life among inevitable statistics.  

He proudly states he is no college graduate,  never had straight A's in high school, and was the least likely to succeed in Middle School. His  story is summarized as a Butterfly, metamorphosing from life stages of instability and struggle to confidence and perseverance through hard work and dedication. 

Chef Rashad greatly appreciates the career programs  introduced to him as a teenager that gave him the rare opportunity to hope again, be a better citizen, and study as an entrepreneur.  Artistic Taste 7 has become a success in the Bay Area and the Mission is driven toward helping what many call Inner City or at Risk Youth, " Street Degree", Beef is no longer a Crime. 


Street Degree is as aggressive as it sounds! The company is meant to effectively engage and interact with disadvantaged young people between the ages of 16-24 , offering them a new path towards a career in Culinary and Business; learning the ins and out of Menu and Recipe Development, Creative thinking, Customer Service and Sales and much more! We understand many of the candidates for our Food Truck have a rocky path of Foster Homes, Imprisonment, and  Dropping out of High School. We also have recognized the ambition and the maturing that was gained from their past, however, the lack of employment opportunities for our youth is an issue and in many cases unaddressed in our communities, Yes, our youth will learn to cook and interact with customers, but we strive to promote 3 important components: Sobriety, Education, and Self Confidence. Street Degree, is not your ordinary "choose-the-A-Student-who-has-a-clean-past" type of Mission, we are perfecting our menus, with imperfect Chefs.

Our MISSION!

It's possible: giving our Youth a new path in Culinary Arts with opportunities to develop the menus and complete training to manage a Food Truck.  

Our GOALS!

For us, we have the great purpose and intentions of helping our youth and supplying them with the resources, however, so much is needed to launch Street Degree. 

1. The Food Truck: We are driven, but we need a Truck to drive! A fully equipped Food Truck  ranges between $35,000 and $45,000.  Includes: Licensing and Insurance: Certification in different counties would certainly broaden our path. It's costly to fund but comes with the Food Truck Business. 


2. Commercial Kitchen: The right "fully equipped" kitchen will allow us to train our youth before they graduate to the Truck, stock our inventory, prep, secure parking for our Truck, and cook our menu items. Pricing for a 2000 square foot kitchen such as below, is currently estimated at $3500.00 for rent and $2000.00 for Utilities. Initial move-in amount is $10,500.00 in the Bay Area.


Add'l Estimated Start up Costs: $18K-$23K which includes Food Inventory, Pots, Pans, Utensils, Building Improvements/Repairs/Licensing. 

CURRENT SITUATION:

Chef Rashad caters through the Bay Area Full Time at Special Events, co-working spaces, and Community Engagements. He devotes his weekends at the Berkeley Flea Market, serving at least 150 customers per day with his famous $10 BBQ Plates. His customers know him by name or by his Sauce, sending encouragement and prayers for acquiring a Food Truck for Street Degree.


 

Share our Link on  your Social Media sites and with your trusted Network of Friends and Co Workers. Your support gets us a little closer to our Goals!

CONTACT US for any questions or inquiries:

info@artistictaste7.com

www.artistictaste7.com

See you on the Street!

story:
BugWall climb to fund Edible Insect Education

Entomologist, climber, and founder of Bug Vivant Meghan Curry is about to spend  2 weeks thousands of vertical feet above the ground, alone.  She will climb the infamous El Capitan in Yosemite National Park only eating food made with bugs to raise awareness of edible insects as a sustainable food. 

Solo big wall climbing is grueling.  Burning upwards of 5000 calories per day, bugs make the perfect protein-rich, nutritious big wall food.  Edible insects are also delicious – with a massive culinary, ecological, and humanitarian potential that we are only beginning to realize.  

The Bug Wall climb is the perfect test for the exciting new movement.  If bugs can power Meghan's punishing 2 week ascent of El Capitan, then perhaps they should earn a spot at your table too.  This is why Meghan has teamed up with Little Herds and nearly every member of the North American edible insect industry who have donated the awesome perks offered in this campaign.  With your help, we will take sustainable edible insect message beyond the BugWall and also fund the edible insect education programs Little Herds.    


What does Little Herds do?

Little Herds is a multi-chapter nonprofit organization focused on educating our community about entomophagy (eating insects) as an environmentally sound and economically viable way to feed the world.


Why we NEED to Eat Bugs

1.Environmentally sustainable. They use less land, less water and produce fewer emissions than traditional livestock.
2.Nutritious. Bugs provide excellent protein as well as heart healthy Omega-3 fats, and important vitamins and minerals. 
3. Easy to Farm. Bugs have a short life cycle and can be raised in urban environments, freeing up the country-side for oxygen-giving forestry and wildlife.
4. Ethical. They can be easily and humanely euthanized for ethical harvesting. 
5. Delicious & Versatile. They are tasty, easy to prepare and highly versatile. 



If we reach our $5000 goal?

After covering the logistical costs of climbing the Bug Wall, all proceeds of this campaign will continue the educational and outreach programs and events hosted by Little Herds.  Specifically, they will:

  • Purchase new presentation materials like banners and pamphlets to be used at numerous events
  • Buy ingredients used to make edible insect foods given away at events like their famous Chocolate Chirp Cricket Cookies
  • Travel to schools to educate a whole new generation about nutritious, sustainable, and delicious edible insects


If we reach our $7000 stretch goal?

Reaching our $7000 stretch goal  will allow Little Herds to create a scaleable edible insect educational package that will be made available to teachers and community educators.  Each package will include:

  • a copy of Daniella Martinson's book Edible
  • an entomophagy powerpoint presentation customized to 3 different age groups
  • a recipe and enough cricket powder to make class-sized batch of Chocolate Chirp Cricket Cookies.  

Awesome Perks


Risks & Challenges

The risk of big wall climbing and the challenge introducing bugs as food are core concepts driving this project. Climbing is dangerous, big wall climbing is more dangerous, and solo big wall climbing is ... you get the point.  The Mescalito route Meghan will climb has a fall potential of up to 50 feet.  Luckily she has over 11 years of climbing experience to mitigate these risks.  

The challenge of eating insects can be a steep task for most of us the first time; we are afraid of what we don't understand and entomophagy is a pretty new idea.  However, edible insects have great potential to play a huge role in the future of sustainable food.  Let go of your inhibitions; join in the BugWall adventure and give edible insects a try!  


Other Ways You Can Help

If you're fired-up about this project, but our edible insect perks are not in your budget, please share this campaign with your loved ones and keep an open mind about the future of food.

story:
• Plant More/Harvest More - How about a product that will help you grow more plants and harvest more vegetables using a space the size of a lawn chair?
  • Little Crop Circles™ maximize the full potential of garden containers and garden spaces by giving plants room to grow while preventing root overgrowth.

How?

Little Crop Circles™ use a combination of patented design and efficient irrigation to grow lots of vegetables, herbs and flowers in a small circle. Growing plants in a circle is a more efficient use of space than rows. 

Our proprietary Trellis allows you to grow more plants vertically than a typical plant support. Typical plant supports are weak only able to support one plant growing in the center. Our Trellis is strong; able to support lots of plants growing around the outside of the Trellis, which means you will harvest more vegetables.  

A garden hose can be hooked up to our proprietary Irrigator at the top center of the Little Crop Circle™. Instead of spraying water up, a special nozzle sprays a curtain of water down 360 degrees around the Irrigator. From there it flows evenly to the outer edge of the Little Crop Circle™ to the plants. Water use is extremely efficient because it flows right to the top of each plant root - right were they need it and not everywhere else. Water applications at the top of each root prevent a plant from growing too many roots. Left unchecked, roots can quickly fill a garden container or crowd plants growing in a garden inhibiting plant growth and production. 

Benefits

Small Footprint - Big Production - A Little Crop Circle™  requires a minimum 2 feet of space. That's the same space needed for one tomato plant supported by a typical plant trellis. One plant in one trellis will only produce a handful of tomatoes compared to the hundreds of tomatoes grown by a Little Crop Circle™  Trellis using the same space. 

Save Water - A short gentle burst of water 20 seconds a day is all you need to water 30 or more plants growing in the circle. That is equal to the water needed to make your morning coffee - that's 1/10th water needed for a small garden plot watered by conventional irrigators.  

Grow Disease Resistant Plants - Watering at the bottom of plants keeps the tops of plants dry. This prevents water droplets from collecting on leaves and fruit that can spawn a variety of waterborne diseases like powdery mildew or blossom end rot. The video below illustrates this.

Inhibits Root Bound - A plant becomes root bound when roots overgrow in a pot. This happens because plant roots will quickly grow to the bottom of the pot following water that drains too quickly out the bottom. A Little Crop Circle™ encourages plants roots to grow near the top of the pot because water flows evenly from the center of the pot. 

Grow Vine Crops - Use the base without the Trellis to grow nothing but vine crops and harvest hundreds of cucumbers, pumpkin, watermelon and squash.

Reusable - Little Crop Circles™ are strong and durable. Use them year after year. 

Thank you for visiting our page!

story:
Executive Chef Lawrence Rosenberg: President of Bacon Bites, Inc .

Brought Chocolate Covered Bacon to the market in 2012. I have been in the food & marketing business since graduating Pratt Institute in '71. I love the bacon business one might say I'm happy as a pig. It's a tremendous amount of work and keeping up with whats going on in the Bacon World today is truly beyond what I could have imagined 5 years ago. After working out all the challenges I have accomplished what most people would think unimaginable to put it into some sort of prospective in 2014 we cooked approximately 49,000 pounds of bacon and used around 250,000 pounds of chocolate. We travel the United States doing Bacon Festivals, Chocolate & Candy Expos, Beer Festivals and Food Truck Events along with selling wholesale and online through our website .

We Give Back:

We Donate to Alzheimer's Foundation which my Mom currently is suffering from as well as American Heart Association in which I lost my Dad and Younger Brother and to St. Joseph's Children's Hospital: Cooking For Kids.

Our product is 100% Real Crisp Bacon & 100% Real Delicious Tempered Chocolate.

      Perfecting our drying process was key as our products being shelf stable for 1 year and requiring  no refrigeration. Our cute packaging and logo all designed by myself have made Bacon Bites a huge hit. All packaged by hand (Except Bags) and ribbons tied individually (Our Fingers Hurt) I need to quickly ramp up production to meet the demand and fill the orders.

What Your Funding:  

1. Our Huge Opportunity To Take Bacon Bites National w/Big Box Store.
2. Pre tied Ribbons.
3. Buying Bacon & Chocolate To Fill Order.
4. Buying Bagging Film To Fill Order.
5. Two additional double convection ovens to keep up with the cooking of bacon.

What You Get:
We have set up 9 levels of funding from $10.00 - $5,000.00 Each level gets you some of our delicious products which we will ship out to you immediately.
Enjoy it for yourself and just pig out, give it as a gift, or share with friends and co-workers. It's also a great Father's Day Gift.

The Impact:

By helping us you will make "Bacon Fanatics" around the country happy as pigs!

Oinks! For Your Support

If you go to www.baconbites.com you can see all the press and many photos.

story:
Let the vision take control!


"Share Zero Space is the new Social Netwotk of Things and Events". A revolutionary technology allow you to be protagonist in the; all over the world, event control!"


I'm Mario, from Italy. I'm an entrepreneur and an inventor involved in technology since 80' and also CEO of my companies Project Studio and Computer Design. I would like to change the way to approach solutions using a smart point of view.

After many patents and time spent to understand what is really important and what we really need from technology I understood that the best thing we need is a smart tech  that permit to us to reach ubiquity. Imagine how cool it will be when you will be able to control any event you care for in the real world, from every place, by simply accessing a special cloud space and immediately interacting with that event! It will be Awesome!

This idea jumps over all limits if I introduce a least but not last concept. I am not alone!. We are not alone!. Maybe we have a family or maybe we have friends and we want, or simply we need to share or delegate with them this control .

The question becomes hard. What it is sure is that we don’t want to become an engineer or a tech specialist to realize this dream, and above all,  we do not want to spend time and money for it.

We simply need to improve our life quality, saving time, simply acting, controlling, sharing and delegating actions from any place without moving, simply using the network.

This was my staring point, this was the seed of ShareZeroSpace technology, now developed into a tree.

                                                       (Photo of SZS core board)
 
This board is the smart hardware core of SZS technology. This is the connector of real events to the SZS cloud. Since the internet network is now spread all over in the world (fixed or mobile) and it does not discriminate on speed or nations, once you have connected the SZS device to internet you have the full control of any event to which this device is locally connected.

And this is the simpliest device with SZS technology inside that allow to transform a normal power-stripe to a smart 4 socket power-stripe.

    (This SZS smart 4 socket power stripe used in demo is also available as a perk!)

Using the cloud portal and a super-simple multilanguages graphic user interface, on tablet, mobile smartphone or PC's, you can interact with the event, fully freeing the power of Share Zero Space vision.


               (Here pictured a space zone of user account. This is the place for

                               controlling event also with a webcam vision)


How does it works?

Now let me explain how the system works. You only need to have at least one ShareZeroSpace device composed by a standard core board + a standard multi purposes shield or a specialized functions shield.

       (Photo of SZS core board connected + multi pourposes shield on bottom)


You need then to connect the device to the internet network from one side and to the event you need to control on the other. The controlled events may for example be related to electrical motor driven gates, light or light systems, socket or socket stripes, irrigation systems, electrical locks, heating or cooling systems. Or they may consist in events that you need to supervise, such as access to controlled doors, water level controls, power or water metering systems or whatever else is furnished of  an input or output dialogue. The example below shows the capabilities of core SZS board + multi purposes in/out/temp shield.

This stage will require in most cases ten minutes of work by a non super-tech user, may be you or your electrician, or zero minutes by buying a ready to use device, such the power strip exhibit on demo.


                                            ( SZS in all-weather case with dimension)

Then you need to register your new ShareZeroSpace device on the cloud, and, after a ultra simple localized language configuration, all is done.


No specialized devices, no apps, no software, no servers, no long time learning curve. By means of any kind of internet connected device, such as mobile phones, tablets, PC’s, internet totems, etc., you can access your ShareZeroSpace zone using your personal account.

Immediately, you be able to operate on your controlled event through a simple and powerful graphic interface.

You can have multiple ShareZeroSpace devices connected and joined to your account in multiple place all over the world. Awesome superpower!.

But, if you remember, we said, we are not alone. So we introduce the opportunity, with no complications, with no overwork, with no wast of time, to share every single controlled event with others, to delegate and allow others to control atspecfied times signle event connected to the ShareZeroSpace device.

The friend or delegate will be authorized and alerted with a mail that includes the appropriate information. From this point on, your friend can interact with event, and you, if you desire, will be warned anytime. The cool side is that your shared-event friends, in their ZSZ zone on their accounts, can find and use the shared event. When you desire to stop the sharing, with a simple action you can cancel it.

Finally you can also be warned if something has changed by e-mail ( we plan in the future to integrate a sms alert function) if someting event  has changed status, like a opened SZS controlled door or a electric motor failure when SZS will be adopted for check power overcharge.

Since also other people may have an account and multiple SZS device under their control, also they can share with you the control of events. It's like a social network of things, instead of a social network of words.

You can do what you want no matter of community (share), no matter of time (zero), no matter of distance (space). We are designing a special functionality that permits in the future the release of software to share and interact with SZS technology directly by common socials network.

The vision emerging from ShareZeroSpace is that with zero time (without waiting) and zero space (without moving) we can interact with real world events, sharing the resource. That's all.

Simple, sure, instantly and primarily all, smart!.

If you help us joining this campaign, we help you not only to enjoy of this smart solution, but we together can really change our way to enjoy life and have more free time and fun!.

Together we can make the difference from suffer the technology to steer technology!

We make the cloud version running well, and you can verify this by connecting to sharezerospace using the credential: e-mail: demo password: 12345. Once you logged in, then click on Zone and then click icon "control" on rigth side of lava lamp row. Please note, in this demo,  user account data is locked for avoiding undesidered user data changement.

At this point you can locate the lamp status indicator and the command icon where, by clicking, you can control the switching of lamp. You also can use a web cam icon, by clicking it and, after you inserted the camera account (user:user, password:user), direct live video will appear on the screen, showing what happens to the lamp at the moment. You can find all the instructions about demo features and vision, in the document    "Thechnology that we really need" .


By reading it, you can run and enjoy demos, and undestand exactly what happen while you control a lava lamp attached to a power stripe (with szs core smart device + a special shield inside) on our office with online web camera view . Yes!!!!, SZS allow users to associate a web camera for every connected event and more other feature, including a special function involving QR code for special speed access mode if your mobile device such smartphone is equipped with a camera and QR reading software.

             (photo of demo place, powerstrip + lava lamp connected on socket #1)


What We Need & What You Get

We have built hardware and software prototype almost ready for production, complete with a smart all-weather case.

                             ShareZeroSpace device on all-weather case.

           (on left SZS single component and on the rigth SZS ready to ship)

A milestone has been accomplished and a device is ready for production, but more work is needed to make it a ready to market product. This must be equipped with multiple solutions like ready to use power stripe, ready to use irrigation system, possibility of micro cloud applications, and must also include other friendly features in software and an ultra-modern skin. So we need founding and we hope to rise at least $ 9.999 for developing all options we have in mind.

What we do with your donation if we reach the goal.


Thank's to our local region success ad with local funding in spreading SZS on the last campaign we fix the goal to a special ultra low budget. This allow us to try to diffuse our technology all over the world.

Why we decide for $9.999? Our woking plan, if we reach the goal with your help include this task:

- We plan to design, using the same easiness of use, a better cloud site, also                designed for auto-adapting for all mobile platform such smartphone and tablet and a free downloadable all server platform micro SZS cloud software.

- We want improve languages localization for a better share experience with other people.

- We plan to realize a stylish design case for SZS device, also for accessories.

- We plan to realize a single plug and play SZS smart socket for every use, for share and control any type of socket appliance at home like: microwave oven, electric heater (also using included temperature control), etc.

- We plan to realize a single plung and play SZS input control for every use, like infra-red  sensor for alarm and for presence (child and pet applications), etc.
 
- We plan to develop battery operated mobile device for mobile lock systems, including GPS active localization, for automotive use and social mobile share like car and cicle pooling, etc.

- We want to promote the use of this tecnology in city council for adopting in public lighting system (for energy saving and on demand use),  water leakege preventing systems, etc.

- We had designed and we plan to develop a new cheap environment monitoring  sensors systems for take care of our planet. We use this tecnology for deploy the our patens in multiple branch of technology. Parking and logistic, environment (smart sensor for monitoring and forewarn; fire, flooding, hurricanes, pollution) ,  personal security, etc. (if you are interested on our patent  search Mario Puppo as inventor in EPO database).

- We just have extend the SZS patent we made all over the world

Budget will be assigned in this way:

$ 3.500  allocated for develop and improve new software functions
$ 2.500  allocated for design case, accessories, and mobile SZS device
$ 2.000 allocated for servers farm (we want the use of SZS cloud be free forever)
$ 999    allocated for environment protection and control device

We worked hard since more than one year for present you this challenge. It's real, and you can direcly try with the demo. But with your help as we had explain, we can finally complete what we have in mind and what we have included in our working plan here described.

What you get


If you will be a part of this evolution being an early adopter of this technology and of this new vision, you will be a part of a new way of thinking globally, but actually you can immediately enjoy the perks derived by the adoption of ShareZeroSpace model.

If you decide to partecipate to this campaign, even also with a litte donation, we will hear you on all of your suggest for improve SZS technology

In return, depending on what perks you choose, you may get the coolest ShareZeroSpace device fully functional  also in a smart all-weather case with full of documentation and you are free to use the SZS cloud. There will be, based on SZS device, a series of accessories that permit the connection of the device to the network using IP over power, WiFi and 3G for mobile use, and an efficient localization of it with active GPS. If you are a developer or simply you want to adopt this technology on your website or on your own developed cloud application, join the developers program by choosign perks including SDK or SZS SDK+ SZS Cloud source software, to have complete access to software and hardware resources.


                 Future version of ShareZeroSpace device on all-weather case .
  (SZS equipped with IP over power on the left and equipped with WiFi on the rigth)


If you are experienced developer  and if you want to develop shield yourself, base developing device is also available consisting of a core SZS smart device + software and hardware resources. This will let you do develop your personal type of device based on SZS technology and start to create your micro-cloud SZS for your need our for your markets.

Due to many request we receive after this campaign was started, we also decide to dovelop and propose (included in perks) a stand alone SZS cloud server for anyone want to create personal and private SZS cloud server. (read Q&A and also Update)

Your found will be used for this, only for this!. So, please hep us, donate or  join  perks and enjoy about this unique possibilities.
Rest assured we will notify everyone of what's going on so there will be no surprises at all.

The Impact

We are a small company and without you, we cannot free the complete power of SZS tech. We want to continue to work on these technology because we trust on it. We have adopted it as first user, daily, and we are sure it will give you the benefits you are searching for.

Without your contributions, we cannot afford to pay  for manufacturing the of the ready to market products and for improving  the cloud software platform, so please donate!  With your help, we can bring Share Zero Space technology into the world and your make more and more simple saving time,  sharing opportunities and be more happy.

We trust that toegether we can deliver the most disruptive and revolutionary tech of new millenium!.

Risks & Challenges

The major risk, for you and us together, is to loose an opportunity. Losing this challenge means loosing the opportunities to finally have technology that we really need, that we really want.

The dream of a real world connected as described above is one step from reality. Daily we use the SZS technology and the prototypes. We will be happy to share with the world our daily personal experience.

We worked hard for doing what we offer to you today. Give power to this real opportunity, join us and claim your perks.   

Our family, our friends, from now enjoy of this happiness, now it's your time.


Shiping cost of pledge

We are able to ship your pledged materials all over the world. We do not want to overcharge shipping cost, so you can pay the shipping cost exactly for destination.
So you need to add shipping cost to the pledge you choose.

We have negotiate shipping cost for all over the world cost, They are:

Europe and Middle East                |         $ 20
Rest of the world                            |         $ 30

This includes standard international post shipping. If you need or you want to use international express shipping, pease let us to know and we arrange the best shippig cost for sending goods with DHL, UPS, FedEx.

Please Note:

Shipping cost do no apply to perks regarding stikers. In this case shipping cost are included.

  • our shipping rates do not include any taxes or charges you may incur on arrival in your country.

  • combined shipping, at this time we do not have any price estimates for combined shipping, currently it is more cost effective to send each product individually and we are still working with DHL to get better rates ASAP.

In every case of doubt, feel freeto  contact us. We enjoy to help you.


Other Ways You Can Help

We are happy of what you can do! In every case if you like our vision and our concrete solutions, please share with others, no matter if are friends or not, the awesome ShareZeroSpace challenge. Share is a big part of vision, because in every case, 1+1 is more than two.

So, invite, let others to know this opportunities, and finally, if this challenge will be accomplished, even you, can enjoy about the success,  maybe using your personal ShareZeroSpace device or any event shared with you by your friends or your company.


Questions and Answers (Q&A)

Q: I like solutions offered by SZS but what's about the question I want make a private cloud running only on my private network.

A: Hi funder. No problem, if you buy a micro-cloud server running SZS you can create your personal and even private SZS cloud. This mean you can put it in you private network and running it by controlling and sharing event like the world wide cloud on your private network.
If you connect it to the internet (e.g. by your home adsl or wan) this will spread all over the world, and you can reach from any place, but remain your provate SZS cloud 

Q: After buy a SZS device, how I need to do for connect it to SZS cloud for control and share event connected to my SZS device

A: What is needed is simply input the unicode serial string (proviced with yout SZS device) in the page "Device" after clicking add device. After this operation,you can assign descriptive names to your events and after configuring Ip address of yor network all is done. From now you'll find all event in your "Zone" page.  You can from now; control, share and delegate any event. SZS Cloud allow you can do everythings  from any device connected to the internet all over the world.

Q: Why you think the product also without case?

A: Because we consider the owner want to embed the SZS device in their appliance instead of place another case. However, we design the all-weather case for everytype of installation, inside and outside. In the future we plan to have a case for inside with better design.

Q: How long takes to electrically connect SZS device to an event?

A: Depend on event. In most case, like the electric gate, the irrigations system, the garden lights, etc. is a question of minutes. Consider that digital output o SZS device consist in a relay with open-common-close contact. It's like to connect a standard switch. 

Q: Can I use SZS device like a smart house bus component?

A: Yes, the SZS device can work like a smart house bus component. Configuring it with function "digital input act on related digital output"  and all is done. Locally you'll connect the wall switch to digital input and the related digital output (relay) will work like a switch. From this point you can locally switching the charge (eg.lamp) with your old wall switch and remotely you can use SZS cloud  in your account for control the switch event. The output can work like a two state switch (open/close) or if you want like a push button with desidered hold time (programmable). The power stripe output wokr like this. Remotely you can control related output socket and locally the same using the small red button (see socket stripe demo's photo). Feedback on SZS cloud is always the true state of input or output.  

Q: What type of internet connection need SZS device

A: SZS device work with all type of internet connection from super slow 33.6K, to a fast 100M fiber optic. Every type such fixed ADSL, WAN, HDSL work well and for mobile applications GPRS, 3G, 4G are suitable.
Traffic from SZS clousd and SZS device use a very small bandwith and the footrprint of SZS on your network is very small.

Q: What about SZS device in mobile use

A: SZS device work perfecty in mobile use. The device can work with a low power supply (9-12 VDC@ 0.6A max with all relay engaged) and is suitable to work with battery operated or with energy saving system such battery and solar pannel. Communication with internet can be realized using a GPRS, 3G or 4G connection. If SZS device is equipped with a WiFi expansion, it can operate also using smartphone or portable router. This means you can use for eg. for control door car opening or anti theft solution for cutting fuel simply stopping electric fuel car pump.

Let the vision take control!"Share Zero Space is the new Social Netwotk of Things and Events". A revolutionary technology allow you to be protagonist in the; all over the world, event control!"



I'm
Mario, from Italy. I'm an entrepreneur and an inventor involved
in technology since 80' and also CEO of my companies Project Studio and Computer Design. I would like to change the way to approach solutions using a
smart point of view.



After many patents and time spent to understand what is really important and what we really need from technology I understood that the best thing we need is a smart tech  that permit to us to reach ubiquity. Imagine how cool it will be when you will be able to control any event you care for in the real world, from every place, by simply accessing a special cloud space and immediately interacting with that event! It will be Awesome!
This idea jumps over all limits if I introduce a least but not last concept. I am not alone!. We are not alone!. Maybe we have a family or maybe we have friends and we want, or simply we need to share or delegate with them this control .The question becomes hard. What it is sure is that we don’t want to become an engineer or a tech specialist to realize this dream, and above all,  we do not want to spend time and money for it.
We simply need to improve our life quality, saving time, simply acting, controlling, sharing and delegating actions from any place without moving, simply using the network.
This
was my staring point, this was the seed of ShareZeroSpace technology, now developed into a tree.
                                                       (Photo of SZS core board)  This board is the smart hardware core of SZS technology. This is the connector of real events to the SZS cloud. Since the internet network is now spread all over in the world (fixed or mobile) and it does not discriminate on speed or nations, once you have connected the SZS device to internet you have the full control of any event to which this device is locally connected.And this is the simpliest device with SZS technology inside that allow to transform a normal power-stripe to a smart 4 socket power-stripe.    (This SZS smart 4 socket power stripe used in demo is also available as a perk!)Using the cloud portal and a super-simple multilanguages graphic user interface, on tablet, mobile smartphone or PC's, you can interact with the event, fully freeing the power of Share Zero Space vision. 
               (Here pictured a space zone of user account. This is the place for                                controlling event also with a webcam vision) 

How does it works?

Now let me explain how the system works. You only need to have at least one ShareZeroSpace device composed by a standard core board + a standard multi purposes shield or a specialized functions shield.
       (Photo of SZS core board connected + multi pourposes shield on bottom)

You need then to connect the device to the internet network from one side and to the event you need to control on the other. The controlled events may for example be related to electrical motor driven gates, light or light systems, socket or socket stripes, irrigation systems, electrical locks, heating or cooling systems. Or they may consist in events that you need to supervise, such as access to controlled doors, water level controls, power or water metering systems or whatever else is furnished of  an input or output dialogue. The example below shows the capabilities of core SZS board + multi purposes in/out/temp shield.
This stage will require in most cases ten minutes of work by a non super-tech user, may be you or your electrician, or zero minutes by buying a ready to use device, such the power strip exhibit on demo.

                                            ( SZS in all-weather case with dimension)Then you need to register your new ShareZeroSpace device on the cloud, and, after a ultra simple localized language configuration, all is done.

Remotely you can control related output socket and locally the same using the small red button (see socket stripe demo's photo). Feedback on SZS cloud is always the true state of input or output.  Q: What type of internet connection need SZS deviceA: SZS device work with all type of internet connection from super slow 33.6K, to a fast 100M fiber optic. Every type such fixed ADSL, WAN, HDSL work well and for mobile applications GPRS, 3G, 4G are suitable. Traffic from SZS clousd and SZS device use a very small bandwith and the footrprint of SZS on your network is very small.Q: What about SZS device in mobile useA: SZS device work perfecty in mobile use. The device can work with a low power supply (9-12 VDC@ 0.6A max with all relay engaged) and is suitable to work with battery operated or with energy saving system such battery and solar pannel. Communication with internet can be realized using a GPRS, 3G or 4G connection. If SZS device is equipped with a WiFi expansion, it can operate also using smartphone or portable router. This means you can use for eg. for control door car opening or anti theft solution for cutting fuel simply stopping electric fuel car pump.

story:
Help a child ride!

My name is Stacey Ryder. I founded Reins From Above Therapeutic Riding Center (www.reinsfromabove.org) 10 years ago. We use horseback riding as therapy for special needs children/adults. Our biggest challenges over the years have been finding a permanent location and finding funding for special needs families that cant afford the benefits of therapeutic riding because most of their money is spent on traditional therapies and medical bills.

 These children cant participate in regular activities like sports, cheer-leading and gymnastics due to their disability. BUT, they can learn to ride a HORSE! The fact that they receive health benefits from riding a horse is just a bonus. I have seen children that cant walk, take their first steps, children that couldn't speak, say their first words and  children living in the world of Autism, make amazing connections with the outside world!! Not to mention the increased self esteem they get from bonding with a horse and learning a new skill.

They need YOUR HELP!!  Your contributions go directly to children/adults that cant afford to ride, horse care, facility maintenance and volunteer education. We are strictly a volunteer organization. We are here because we want to help, not to collect a salary. Please consider helping us reach our goal! 

The money we raise will go directly to families that cant afford lessons, horse care (we NEED FEED!), general upkeep/equipment to maintain the farm and quality education for our volunteers. We NEVER turn away student because of money. SPONSOR a child and give them an opportunity to live their lives to their fullest ability. 

Sponsor a  HORSE! They are the only ones that don't "choose" to be here... without them, we couldn't do what we do! All of our horses would otherwise be retired in a pasture somewhere. We give them a job to do in their later years. It gives them  purpose again. 

We are a VOLUNTEER organization. All of our trained volunteers are dedicated to providing a safe, fun and beneficial experience on the horse. Our instructors have been certified or currently being trained to use the "Horse Boy Method". Proven to help those with Autism and other spectrum disorders. Education is expensive!! 

Thank You for making a difference in the lives of others!  Your generosity and kindness is greatly appreciated. It is a difference that will change a life!

story:
You’ve seen our mobile gourmet coffee truck, Mojo Express, around town now we need your contributions to turn it into a cafe in Maywood!

My name is Renee Long and I’m here on Indiegogo to open Mojo Express Cafe into a permanent spot and grow our product line to keep bringing you the highest quality coffee and baked goods in Maywood, IL.

I don’t know if you are aware but Maywood is currently going through gentrification and I will be the only gourmet/organic café.   At this time, there's no cafés in Maywood where you can sit outside and enjoy a refreshing cup of coffee.   I want to be the first.  I want to  bring  a rustic, shabby chic style with recyclable and biodegradable products.  I'm also looking to be the first business to have installed solar panels on the roof, which will also help contribute to Maywood's economy . 

Also, Maywood does not have sufficient and relaxing meeting centers.  So, I'll  bring a café where business owners or groups etc.. can come have meetings and enjoy a variety of unique blend of coffee.  New development will also provide patrons access to free WiFi or they can watch TV while waiting for their cars either being repaired or wash in nearby shops. And lastly, where nearby high school youth can come and hang out for a while.

Because of the redevelopment, my goal will be to provide employment opportunities in the community not only in the café but for the mobile vehicle as well. I’ve spoken with officials at the Village Hall, along with the Chief of Police, postal workers and a host of other officials who are excited as well.


But we can't make it happen without your contributions!

Why Mojo Express?

We’re coffee with a conscience. 

If you care about strengthening local communities, you’re in the right spot.

If you love coffee, you’re in the right spot. 

If you care about environmental sustainability, you’re in the right spot.

I’ve been serving up coffee for the past five years and customers love it!

Now I’m here to grow!   We will be serving  delicious homemade pies along with our best coffee and other baked goods that will hit the spot.  



If you’re in the Oak Park and Maywood area, you might have seen us driving around.  Our gourmet coffee truck delivers delicious gourmet/organic and fair trade coffee to tons of happy customers.  Now, we’re looking to grow into a comfortable space for all to enjoy, so why don’t you join us by being a part of this fantastic addition to Maywood, IL!

That’s not all.  Mojo Express will be a café you feel good about.


And here's a preview of that Limited Edition Mojo Express Travel Mug:





Mojo Express Café will mean soooo much to the community!  Bringing our assorted unique blends of coffee and other beverages you will not fined anywhere will keep people coming.  And honestly, that's just so darn good. 

We can't do it without you. Let's make it happen!

Don’t lose your Mojo! Give a few bucks to get some great coffee then share this Indiegogo campaign with a friend.

Thanks!

story:
I will be joining a team of volunteers from CRED Foundation to head on out to Uganda.

Whilst the team and I are out in Uganda we will be helping out a community by teaching the children simple mathematics and English as well as doing a lot of fun party dances and other fun activities. We will be going out to do some home visits in this community to hear the locals' stories and what has happened in their lives. We will be taking out some resources such as: pens, books and other equipment that they do not have the privilege of commonly having.

The trip will last for 9 days and will be taking place in July 2016. The reasoning for needing this amount of money is to firstly, fund my trip so I can get out there and actually make a difference I.E flights. Secondly, the money raised will help us get the equipment needed to resource our lessons and make the lessons as fun as possible for the children we are helping. It will also go towards food and other things, any amount of money will go a long way.

I am hopefully going to do some stuff to actually raise this money for example, extreme sports or anything else you have ideas for. I will be putting money into this fund also, so please, any money you can spare will help this trip of a lifetime and all your donations will be going towards this trip in one way or another.

You will see the 9 day trip as I will be making a short documentary of my time out there and you will see where your money is heading towards.

Thank you.

CRED Foundation: http://www.cred.org.uk

story:
One in six Angolan children will die before reaching 5 years...

http://www.nytimes.com/2015/03/19/opinion/nicholas-kristof-deadliest-country-for-kids.html?_r=0


Deadliest Country for Kids

LUBANGO, Angola — This is a country laden with oil, diamonds, Porsche-driving millionaires and toddlers starving to death. New Unicef figures show this well-off but corrupt African nation is ranked No. 1 in the world in the rate at which children die before the age of five.

“Child mortality” is a sterile phrase, but what it means here is wizened, malnourished children with twig limbs, discolored hair and peeling skin. Here in Lubango in southern Angola, I stepped into a clinic and found a mother carrying a small child who seemed near death. He was unconscious, his eyes rolling, his skin cold and his breathing labored, so I led the mom to the overburdened nurses.

Just then, 20 feet away, a different mother began screaming. Her malnourished son, José, had just died.


Westerners sometimes think that people in poor countries become accustomed to loss, their hearts calloused and their pain numbed. No one watching that mother beside her dead child could think that — and such wailing is the background chorus in Angola. One child in six in this country will die by the age of five.

That’s only the tip of the suffering. Because of widespread malnutrition, more than one-quarter of Angolan children are physically stunted. Women have a 1-in-35 lifetime risk of dying in childbirth.

In a Lubango hospital, I met a 7-year-old boy, Longuti, fighting for his life with cerebral malaria. He weighed 35 pounds.

His mother, Hilaria Elias, who had already lost two of her four children, didn’t know that mosquitoes cause malaria. When Longuti first became sick, she took him to a clinic, but it lacked any medicine and didn’t do a malaria test. Now Longuti is so sick that doctors say that even if he survives, he has suffered neurological damage and may have trouble walking and speaking again.

Yet kids like Longuti who are seen by a doctor are the lucky ones. Only about 40 percent to 50 percent of Angola’s population has access to the health care system, says Dr. Samson Agbo, a Unicef pediatrics expert.

Angola is a nation of infuriating contradictions. Oil and diamonds give it a wealth that is rare in sub-Saharan Africa, and you see the riches in jewelry shops, Champagnes and $10,000-a-month one-bedroom apartments in the capital, Luanda.

Under the corrupt and autocratic president, José Eduardo dos Santos, who has ruled for 35 years, billions of dollars flow to a small elite — as kids starve.

President dos Santos, whose nation’s oil gives him warm, strong ties to the United States and Europe, hires a public relations firm to promote his rule, but he doesn’t take the simplest steps to help his people. Some of the poorest countries, such as Mauritania and Burkina Faso, fortify flour with micronutrients — one of the cheapest ways possible to save lives — yet dos Santos hasn’t tried that. He invests roughly three times as much on defense and security as on health.

“Children die because there is no medicine,” lamented Alfred Nambua, a village chief in a thatch-roof village on a rutted dirt road near the northern city of Malanje. The village has no school, no latrine, no bed nets. The only drinking water is a contaminated creek an hour’s hike away.

“Now there’s nothing,” said Nambua, 73, adding that life was better before independence in 1975.

“In the colonial period, when I was sick, they were afraid I would die and gave me good care,” he said, and he pretended to shiver in imitation of malaria. “Now when I’m sick, no one cares if I die.”

Statisticians say that Angola’s child mortality is, in fact, declining — but achingly slowly.

“Death in this country is normal,” said Dr. Bimjimba Norberto, who runs a clinic in a slum outside the capital. A few doors down, a funeral was beginning for Denize Angweta, a 10-month-old baby who had just died of malaria.

“If I lived in another country, I could still be playing with my daughter,” Denize’s father, Armondo Matuba, said bitterly.

It may get worse. With falling oil prices, the government has proposed a one-third cut in the health budget this year.

I’ve often criticized Western countries for not being more generous with aid. Yet it’s equally important to hold developing countries accountable.

It’s difficult to see why Western countries should continue to donate to Angola and thus let rich Angolans off the hook as they drive Porsches.

There are many ways for a leader to kill his people, and although dos Santos isn’t committing genocide he is presiding over the systematic looting of his state and neglect of his people. As a result, 150,000 Angolan children die annually. Let’s hold dos Santos accountable and recognize that extreme corruption and negligence can be something close to a mass atrocity.

story:
Who We Are

The Refugee Legal Service (Tasmania) is a not for profit refugee legal service in Tasmania whose primary purpose is to provide free legal services to disadvantaged asylum seekers, refugees and migrants in Tasmania, through harnessing the volunteer support of lawyers, law students, migration agents and other interested volunteers.

The RLS is not for profit, volunteer run and not aligned to any political party.

Our Campaign

The Australian Government is about to begin the process of inviting people who

have been termed “Irregular Maritime Arrivals” to apply for Temporary Protection Visas.

Of course, these people are not “illegal”, they are correctly called “refugees”, and they are fleeing some of the most dangerous environments on the planet.

In their current situation, the majority live an enormously difficult existence, unable to work and study, denied a place in the community and some of the most basic freedoms that we take for granted.

A Temporary Protection Visa can change that.

But the process to obtain one isn’t easy. Applying for one involves detailed, technical preparation that only a trained lawyer or migration agent can provide. There is no Legal Aid available to pay for this service and – as they are legally forbidden from working – very few find the resources to pay for it themselves.

It’s a Catch 22 situation for many of these refugees – getting their applications right will mean the difference between staying and getting sent home, and getting sent home might be, quite literally, a matter of life and death.

Now is your opportunity to make a difference!

What We Need: A Migration Agent

The Tasmanian Refugee Legal Service is anxious to help these people make their application, but currently lacks the resources to do so. We receive absolutely no funding from Commonwealth or State Governments, and we do not expect that to change in any time frame that would allow us to help this current group of asylum seekers.

To help these refugees in Tasmania with their Temporary Protection Visa applications we need to employee a migration agent.

Please make a donation to help us achieve this. All donations are tax deductible.

Your Impact

Your donation will help a migration agent give Tasmanian asylum seekers the best possible chance to remain in Australia, which may just save their life.

This is a chance for one asylum seeker to contribute positively and meaningfully to our society just as the vast majority of migrants to this country have always done.

story:
Le Machin Club  est un organisme à but non lucratif dont le principal mandat est l’éducation à la citoyenneté par l’initiation aux arts médiatiques. Laboratoire humain, ouvert et continu d’explorations artistiques et culturelles, de créations de courts-métrages et de reportages par et pour les “jeunes” de 5 à 105 ans, le Machin Club offre à ses membres des activités et projets à courts, moyens et longs termes qui s'ancrent dans la communauté locale et globale par la collaboration et les partenariats avec d’autres organismes.


Avec ses membres, le Machin Club constitue un groupe, une communauté de jeunes enquêteurs et créateurs qui questionnent le passé, leur présent et le futur pour mieux découvrir l’art de vivre ensemble. Utilisant les nouveaux médias comme espace de connexions ludiques et cognitives, lemachinclub.com est la plateforme de partage des expériences des membres du Machin Club. Chaque membre actif dispose d'une page personnelle qu'il peut alimenter de ses propres enquêtes et créations. Le Machin Club, avec l’aide de ses membres partenaires et mentors, propose à ses membres actifs des défis et des concours pour les motiver à participer aux différents projets qu'il encadre. Les projets et activités se construisent autour des thèmes représentés par la fleur des découvertes de Dewey et s'articulent à partir de questionnements. Les objets, les machins chouettes, deviennent des éléments déclencheurs d'enquêtes ou de création, de questionnements, de recherches et de jeux, improvisés ou non.  Ainsi sous forme de reportages, de courts-métrages ou de projets collectifs mobilisateurs dans l'univers des arts médiatiques, le membre du Machin Club s'exprime, prend action et stimule son imaginaire en s'appropriant le monde à sa façon.


QUI SONT LES MEMBRES DU MACHIN CLUB? 

Le membre du Machin Club est âgé entre 5 et 105 ans. Celui-ci partage les valeurs ainsi que la philosophie de l'organisme et respecte la charte éthique du membre. Il aime se questionner sur les objets qui l'entourent en explorant les nouvelles technologies. Il découvre ses intérêts par la participation à divers projets et en initie parfois lui-même selon ce qui le passionne ou l'intrigue. Il développe son esprit critique par l'essai de différentes applications gratuites et développe sa créativité en stimulant sa curiosité par le partage de ses expériences avec la communauté. Il croit en l'expérience collective pour forger sa conception de la vie en société.

Les membres peuvent participer aux concours du Machin Club et bénéficier de certains privilèges chez les membres partenaires grâce à leur carte de membre. Les membres du Machin Club doivent s’acquitter du tarif d’adhésion de base de 20$ et compléter le formulaire de cession de droits d'images (avec autorisation parentale signée pour les mineurs). La plupart des activités du Machin Club sont offertes gratuitement, mais les membres doivent s’y s'inscrire rapidement puisque les places sont toujours limitées.


Membres invités

Amis du Machin Club


Donne droit à une invitation à télécharger l'application mobile, un abonnement à  l'infolettre des activités, un macaron et des autocollants du Machin Club. Les membres invités sont informés des activités du Machin Club, mais peuvent y participer que s’ils deviennent membre actif.

Tarif indigogo: 20$

Membres actifs et collaborateurs

Participants aux projets et employés

Les membres actifs ont une page personnelle sur le site du Machin Club. Ils produisent du contenu et/ou participent aux activités. Ils reçoivent la carte de membre, l'infolettre des activités du Machin Club, un macaron, ainsi qu'une invitation à télécharger l'application mobile.

Tarif indigogo: 40$

Membres

fondateurs

Membres privilèges

Ils ont une page personnelle sur le site du Machin Club, reçoivent la carte de membre et l'infolettre des activités, un macaron, un t-shirt, ainsi qu'une invitation à télécharger l'application mobile. Ils sont également invités à des activités exclusives au siège social de l'organisme.

N.B. Tous les membres officiels du Machin Club 2014-2015 du service de garde de l'école Anne-Hébert sont gracieusement membre fondateur pour l'année 2015-2016.

Tarif indiegogo: 125$

Membres donateurs

les mécènes

Ils ont droit à une page personnelle sur le site du Machin Club, reçoivent la carte de membre et l'infolettre des activités, un macaron, un t-shirt, ainsi qu'une invitation à télécharger l'application mobile. Ils sont également invités à des activités exclusives au siège social de l'organisme et recevront une invitation spéciale à visiter le quartier général du Machin Club avant son ouverture.

Tarif indiegogo: 300$

Membres partenaires

Un organisme, une entreprise, ou une école privée

Les membres partenaires s'inscrivent dans la programmation des activités dans le cadre de projets chapeautés par le Machin Club. Ils peuvent aussi le mandater de développer des projets sur mesure selon une entente établie et approuvée par le Conseil d'administration. Ils bénéficient d’une page sur le Machin Club, leur offrant ainsi une visibilité aux collaborations actives et passées.

Tarif indiegogo: 

1 000$

Les projets font un écho aux objectifs de CIFEJ, le Centre international de films pour l’enfance et la jeunesse, organisation soutenue par l’UNESCO. Inspirés par des thématiques liées aux objets, ces machins qui gravitent autour de l’être humain, les projets du Machin Club se déroulent sur des courtes, moyennes ou longues durées. Ils sont généralement ouverts à tout âge à moins d'une restriction contraire. Ainsi, pour une même activité, l'adolescence, la pré-adolescence, la petite-enfance, l’adulescence, et même l’âge d’or peuvent se côtoyer pour donner lieu à des échanges d'une valeur unique. Les inscriptions des membres aux activités visent à promouvoir l’équité entre les sexes et les classes sociales. 

Le quartier général du Machin Club favorise l’émergence de projets issus des membres en offrant des sessions de création libres pour les membres qui souhaitent s’y inscrire et proposer des idées ou projets au reste de la communauté.

Le siège social est le lieu de rassemblements ponctuels ou réguliers, selon les activités proposées. L'ambiance se rapproche d'un cabaret de curiosités. Débarras d'objets qui rappellent le temps qui passe, l'espace est aménagé pour permettre aux membres d'explorer, de jouer et de créer librement. À tous les mois, un objet intriguant est mis en lumière dans une cloche de verre.  Autour de cet objet dont la fonction principale a disparu ou est appelée à disparaître, les jeunes membres du Machin Club se questionnent et mènent des enquêtes en lien avec sa nature, ses origines et son avenir. Espace multifonctionnel, le siège social du Machin Club est à la fois un studio d’enregistrement et de tournage, une salle de jeux, un laboratoire d’expériences culinaires et scientifiques ainsi qu’un salon pour recevoir des invités d’honneurs. Situé à la bordure du quartier des spectacles de Québec, le siège social a une position stratégique pour la mission du Machin Club.Les lieux seront scénographiés pour offrir un repaire d’inspirations et de créations aux membres unique en son genre. Entre la cabane dans l’arbre, le musée et la maison des jeunes, le quartier général est un endroit qui deviendra le théâtre de rencontres surprenantes.
story_txt:
Le Machin Club  est un organisme à but non lucratif dont le principal mandat est l’éducation à la citoyenneté par l’initiation aux arts médiatiques. Laboratoire humain, ouvert et continu d’explorations artistiques et culturelles, de créations de courts-métrages et de reportages par et pour les “jeunes” de 5 à 105 ans,  le Machin Club offre à ses membres des activités et projets à courts, moyens et longs termes qui s'ancrent dans la communauté locale et globale par la collaboration et les partenariats avec d’autres organismes. Avec ses membres, le Machin Club constitue un groupe, une communauté de jeunes enquêteurs et créateurs qui questionnent le passé, leur présent et le futur pour mieux découvrir l’art de vivre ensemble. Utilisant les nouveaux médias comme espace de connexions ludiques et cognitives, lemachinclub.com est la plateforme de partage des expériences des membres du Machin Club. Chaque membre actif dispose d'une page personnelle qu'il peut alimenter de ses propres enquêtes et créations. Le Machin Club, avec l’aide de ses membres partenaires et mentors, propose à ses membres actifs des défis et des concours pour les motiver à participer aux différents projets qu'il encadre. Les projets et activités se construisent autour des thèmes représentés par la fleur des découvertes de Dewey et s'articulent à partir de questionnements. Les objets, les machins chouettes, deviennent des éléments déclencheurs d'enquêtes ou de création, de questionnements, de recherches et de jeux, improvisés ou non.  Ainsi sous forme de reportages, de courts-métrages ou de projets collectifs mobilisateurs dans l'univers des arts médiatiques, le membre du Machin Club s'exprime, prend action et stimule son imaginaire en s'appropriant le monde à sa façon. QUI SONT LES MEMBRES DU MACHIN CLUB? Le membre du Machin Club est âgé entre 5 et 105 ans. Celui-ci partage les valeurs ainsi que la philosophie de l'organisme et respecte la charte éthique du membre. Il aime se questionner sur les objets qui l'entourent en explorant les nouvelles technologies. Il découvre ses intérêts par la participation à divers projets et en initie parfois lui-même selon ce qui le passionne ou l'intrigue. Il développe son esprit critique par l'essai de différentes applications gratuites et développe sa créativité en stimulant sa curiosité par le partage de ses expériences avec la communauté. Il croit en l'expérience collective pour forger sa conception de la vie en société. Les membres peuvent participer aux concours du Machin Club et bénéficier de certains privilèges chez les membres partenaires grâce à leur carte de membre. Les membres du Machin Club doivent s’acquitter du tarif d’adhésion de base de 20$ et compléter le formulaire de cession de droits d'images (avec autorisation parentale signée pour les mineurs). La plupart des activités du Machin Club sont offertes gratuitement, mais les membres doivent s’y s'inscrire rapidement puisque les places sont toujours limitées.


Membres invités
Amis du Machin Club 



Donne droit à une invitation à télécharger l'application mobile, un abonnement à  l'infolettre des activités, un macaron et des autocollants du Machin Club. Les membres invités sont informés des activités du Machin Club, mais peuvent y participer que s’ils deviennent membre actif.

story:
Short Summary

Neighbourly, Neighborly is a charitable group founded by ex-pats living in Jeonju, South Korea. It's mission is to bring love, happiness and hope for the Korean orphans in and around Jeonju, South Korea. 

What We Need & What You Get

Every year we raise funds to help the orphans in multiple ways. ONE event we are concentrating on now are Christmas presents! We purchase gifts, which these kids wouldn't normally receive and bring them to the kids aged infants to 18 years old at four different orphanages! It's one of the few times of the year when we hand out presents. The other is on Children's day. All you have to do is contribute $5, $10, $15 or whatever you can afford. It's that simple!  You will be part of giving smiles and laughter to these kids that do not get adopted. YOU will provide such an impact on their lives!

The Impact

You might think--it's too simple. But to the kids this is HUGE! They normally don't receive anything during the year other than our time. Unfortunately, we are not a registered charity because we are all foreigners. It would be too difficult to register, so we do what we can. We visit the kids and play with them, while bringing them snacks and games. We raise money primarily thru private, local donations. But each year, it's difficult for us to reach our goals since we are a small community! This is where you can help us! These kids need to know people in the world are thinking of them! They need to know they are wanted and loved! Any extra funds we raise, is put into special accounts for those girls that graduate from the orphanages. It helps them live out in the world without having to get into the sex trade. You can be a very simple solution to their world. Please open up your hearts and help us, help them.

story:
** English follows below**

Les enfants adorent jouer, explorer, imaginer et quelle meilleure façon de les inciter qu’un centre d'activités? Les terrains de jeux intérieurs sont devenus de plus en plus populaires au Canada. Ces centres de loisirs vont bien au-delà d’un espace de jeux à l’intérieure des restaurants de restauration rapide. Ces centres disposent de multiples activités appropriées pour enfants de 10 ans et moins, ainsi que des endroits confortables pour les adultes afin pendant que leurs enfants s’amusent.

À ce stade, nous avons travaillé dur pour rassembler toutes les informations et nous avons pris les mesures nécessaires pour l'ouverture du centre. Qui aurait pu savoir que ce serait une telle aventure! Maintenant, nous sommes à la recherche d’aide de la communauté pour nous aider à faire le reste du chemin! Comme vous pouvez imaginez, ce type d'aventure est très coûteux, cette campagne nous aidera énormément avec les banques, non seulement en termes d'emprunt, mais aussi en pour notre stratégie de marché, si nous pouvons réussir à amasser suffisamment d'argent, alors la banque verra que notre entreprise est nécessaire et il aidera à mieux justifier l'ouverture. Voilà pourquoi nous demandons à la communauté de participer et de nous aider à rendre ceci possible! Avec votre aide, nous serons définitivement en mesure d'ouvrir le centre et bientôt tous nos enfants pourront courir, sauter, jouer, explorer et grandir ensemble!

Nous avons trouvé quelques récompenses intéressantes et attrayantes dont vous allez pouvoir profiter! Non seulement vous recevrez ces récompenses, mais nous voulons aussi que notre entreprise fasse partie de la communauté, c'est pourquoi nous avons mis au point l'idée d'avoir un "mur des partisans". Le mur des partisans sera dans le centre et contiendra tous les noms des personnes qui nous ont appuyés durant la campagne. Nous pensons qu'il va ajouter une touche spéciale au centre et vraiment afficher l'aspect communautaire que nous voulons capturer! En plus de tout cela, nous voulons vraiment donner en retour, ce qui est pourquoi pour chaque 10 $ amassé lors de la campagne, nous allons faire un don de 1 $ à la banque alimentaire locale. Nous pensons que ce sera un moyen fantastique pour aider à redonner à la communauté et aider nos voisins dans le besoin!

Nous sommes très heureux de créer cette entreprise à Aylmer, avec tant d'amour pour la ville, nous savons que ce sera un merveilleux ajout!

S'il vous plaît, notez que si jamais ce projet tombe à l’eau, tout fonds reçu durant la campagne sera remboursé.

www.facebook.com/AylmerFunCenter

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Kids love to play, explore, imagine and what better way to entice them than a activity center? Indoor playgrounds have become increasingly popular around the country. These recreation centers go way beyond play spaces inside a fast food restaurant. They feature age appropriate activity areas for kids age 10 and under, as well as comfortable places for adults to gather while their children are engaged in active fun!

At this point, we've been working hard to gather all the information and have taken the necessary steps to opening the center. Who could have known that this would be such an adventure, but it's been exhilarating! Now we're looking to the community to help us make it the rest of the way! As you can imagine, this type of adventure is quite costly, this campaign will help us immensely with the banks, not only in terms of borrowing, but also in terms of our market strategy, if we can successfully raise enough money, then the banks will see that our business is needed and it will help better justify opening. That's why we're asking the community to join in and help make this happen! With your help we will definitely be able to get the center open and soon all our children will be able to run, jump, play, explore and grow together!

We've come up with some interesting and enticing perks that you can take advantage of! Not only will you receive the perks, but as a small center we want our business to be a part of the community, which is why we've come up with the idea to have a "Backer's Wall". The Backer's wall will be in the center and will have all the names of our supporters written on it. We think it will add that special touch to the center and really portray the community aspect that we want to capture! In addition to all of this, we really want to give back, which is why for every 10$ raised during our campaign we're going to donate 1$ towards the Local food bank. We feel that this will be a fantastic way to help give back to the community and help out our neighbors in need!

We are so excited to bring this business to Aylmer, with so much love for the town; we know it'll be such a wonderful addition!

Please note that if ever this project falls through all the money received from the campaign will be returned.

www.facebook.com/AylmerFunCenter
