story:
Access An Entire Fleet of Cars For Less Than The Cost Of The One You Own Now

MEET YOYO - It's the smartest way to drive.

  • drive any car you want at any time.
  • we drop-off / pickup wherever you are.
  • everything's included in a low per-mile fee.
  • swap for another car at any time.
  • save hundreds over car ownership.
  • no insurance hassles, repair bills or even trips to the gas station.


Check us out at joinyoyo.com



Own a car? Please let us start by extending our empathy -- we too have experienced the ongoing love-hate relationship challenges that come with car ownership.

On the one hand, we all bought into the concept that owning a car would be the ultimate symbol of our freedom and independence. But then on the other there’s the reality of expensive monthly bills, insurance premiums, maintenance, regular oil changes, rising gas costs, and overpriced repair bills.

That’s why we created YOYO: The revolutionary new on-demand service giving drivers everywhere a better alternative to car ownership.

YOYO provides on-demand, pay-per-mile access to an entire fleet of personal vehicles without any of the hassles that come with traditional car ownership -- empowering car owners to ditch their cars while keeping their freedom. 


Ditch Your Car. Keep Your Freedom.


Check us out at joinyoyo.com


The Dead End Road Of Traditional Car Ownership 

Remember what it was like becoming a car owner for the very first time? The shopper’s high in hand-selecting the perfect set of wheels? The sense of accomplishment after finally closing the deal? The sudden surge of newfound empowerment and freedom you felt leaping into the driver’s seat, gripping the wheel, and fantasizing about the endless possibilities of hightailing it wherever you want, whenever you want?

Then you wake up and experienced the inevitable, emotional gear- shift not long after the initial honeymoon phase has burned up its fuel. The expensive monthly bills and insurance premiums, the maintenance, the regular oil changes and rising gas costs, the overpriced repair bills – all begin to kill that dream.

Do you know what your car actually costs you every month? Do you know how much you pay for each mile you drive? When asked about their monthly car costs, most people only consider their car payment, which on average is around $482. But that $482 isn’t the whole cost to own that car — far from it.

We almost always overlook all the other sneaky car-related leaks from our wallets. We have license fees, registration fees and taxes. We need to buy insurance, fill the gas tank, go in for regular maintenance. And our cars lose value from depreciation every day we own it.

These other costs could well end up doubling our out-of-pocket expenses. That’s NUTS! Especially given the fact that we drive our cars, on average, 56 minutes a day - that’s just 4% of the time! 



We’re right there with you.

We realized too that our cars that used to be the ultimate symbol of freedom and independence are actually really lousy assets to own. And it turns out we’re not alone.

There are over 100 million households in the US who own 230 million cars. We collectively spend over $1.5 TRILLION (yes, that’s a T) on our cars. We started YOYO because believe that as much as a third of this money that we consumers spend is just fat in a ridiculously inefficient system. To add insult to injury, it's a rigged system and the inefficiencies are totally artificial.

The reality is that more and more folks like you look at car ownership as an expensive burden more than anything else. You value your time over physical assets. That’s exactly why Uber, Lyft, ZipCar, and other modern transportation alternatives are taking off like gangbusters.

The times certainly are a-changin’ and the sharing economy is taking hold fast and furious throughout the United States -- but relying on these kinds of services on a full-time basis just isn’t doable for most consumers’ pocketbooks. 


A Better Way To Get Moving

With YOYO, we’ve figured out a way that you can completely liberate yourself from all of these pain points while still maintaining that sense of freedom and independence that lies at the heart of the car ownership philosophy.

Tired of paying an arm and a leg for monthly car payments, insurance premiums, oil changes, and gas costs? Yeah. So are we. With YOYO, you’re free from all of these expenses. Everything is included in a single, per-mile fee -- where you pay only for the miles you actually drive!

Ready to ditch the car depreciating in your driveway while keeping all of your freedom?

Hop in, buckle up, and join us for the ride! 



Easy As 1, 2, 3...

YOYO provides you with flexible access to an entire fleet of cars for less than the cost of owning. Our on-demand white-glove concierge service delivers the right car for the right occasion right to your door.



All it takes is a 1-click, super-fast sign up from our mobile app using your social credentials, and we make it easier than ever to begin reaping the all of the many benefits that YOYO offers.

The pains of paying an arm and a leg for monthly car bills and astronomical insurance premiums? GONE!

Astronomical insurance premiums and complicated claims processes for minor fender-benders? HISTORY!

The vulnerability of getting swindled by repair shop mechanics? NEVER AGAIN! 


What You Get With YOYO



Here’s what YOYO members stand to gain from our service:

Complete on-demand, flexible access to an entire fleet of cars.

With YoYo, you can take a sedan to the office during the week, trade it for an SUV for the family camping trip over the weekend, and then swap it out for a convertible to escort your better half on a swanky night out on the town. Or for you single parents out there, while that minivan is perfectly practical for shuttling the kids around, wouldn’t it be great if you could roll up to your date’s house in something just a little bit sexier? The options are limitless.

A hassle-free, white-glove concierge service.

We’ll send out a YOYO agent to deliver your selected set of wheels right to you -- whenever you want, wherever you are. When you’re finished with it, you can either drop it off at our place or press a button and one of our agents will pick it up for you -- with an option to swap out for a different car, if it strikes your fancy.

Savings

YOYO members are completely free from purchasing, financing, insurance, repair, maintenance, DMV registrations, airport parking -- virtually all of the wallet-gouging expenses common to personal car ownership. You save hundreds over all other alternatives for the same car, and it’s completely predictable. You get to free up money for stuff that really matters to you.

Pay-per-mile driving

Our members only pay for the miles that they actually drive. Want to enjoy a lazy Sunday indoors to catch up on your Netflix? With YOYO, you can keep your options open while keeping your wallet closed -- because never again will you have to pay a single penny for an idle car. With YOYO, the family car is finally a true utility that you can turn on and off whenever you want. That’s a luxury that peer-to-peer services and traditional car ownership simply CAN’T offer.

Referral rewards

YOYO makes it possible for our members to drive completely for free over time. Any time you refer one of your friends or family members to YOYO, you will receive recurring credits and bonuses to lower your cost of driving. The more people you refer, the more points you earn.

Peace of mind

By letting go of car ownership you’re actually back in the driver’s seat. Has sort of a Zen ring to it, doesn’t it? The family car is now a true utility – you can turn it on or off on demand.


Flexible Pricing Plans. No Surprises.

Choose the car that works for you. Our pricing is flexible and totally variable so you can get, and pay for, exactly what you need. No decoder ring required. 

Kind Words From Our Supporters

“As a suburbanite living away from the core locations where typical car sharing services stage their cars, the aspect of your service which brings the car to me is very compelling. Best of luck with the service!“ - B Cello from Glenview

“Damn, wow, what a friggin awesome concept, love it. This is really exciting, what a great concept.” - D Schwartz

“Wow! Feels like the future of cars. Awesome company, awesome service. I’m a big fan. Seriously folks - never fall victim to dealership shenanigans again” - Michaela S.

“I just think this is a great idea” - Bill S.

“My wife and I find ourselves purchasing a new vehicle every year. As you can imagine we carry over some money to each new vehicle we finance. After reading about YOYO I became quickly interested in becoming a member.” - Christian W.

“I am a divorced dad of 3 boys. When I have them, I truck them around in my minivan, but on “mama days” I find myself having to pickup dates in a Dodge Caravan lol. Needless to say, that’s a problem on the dating scene. Would love to have a part-time Mustang from YOYO. I’m the posterchild for YOYO.” – Craig E.

“This sounds like such a promising venture! I'm excited to see where this leads.” - C Townley

What an absolutely great concept. Can I work for you? - M. Gill “Yo Yo Yo...enough said” - prospective member & man of few words

“Exactly the concept I've been looking for. Can't wait for it to come to Arizona!” - R.P. from Phoenix

“I look forward to my first YoYo experience in the near future. I'll make sure to follow news and media on your successes (which are sure to come).” - G.A. from Cleveland

“Awesome! Can’t wait to use this new service. Make Kansas City your second city and we'll be all set. I'll be keeping an eye on your success! Best of luck, great idea.” - R. Stillwell

“I’m in Chicago. I’m ready to join. I’m onboard. Let’s go! Let’s go! Let’s go!” - R. Jeffries from Merrillville 


Our Story

The concept of YOYO was conceived a year ago when Ro’s (one of the founders) car broke down. Like most consumers not adept with the complexities of the modern car engine, he was at the mercy of the repair shop and facing a very large bill. Ro approached his co- founder Hari, his long-time colleague and go-to auto guru. Hari intervened and saved him from being taken for thousands of dollars. After this experience, it became clear to both of them that the car ownership model is massively broken because of pervasive and totally artificial information asymmetry at every node in the value chain. The two began studying the inefficiencies and gaps that exist in the automotive industry that always seem to put consumers at a disadvantage. Their attempt to dissolve all the car-related headaches for the consumer and disrupt a 100-year old ‘broken’ car consumption model eventually led to the formation and launch of YOYO.

What we have found is that despite all the “car disruption” noise out there, people are still facing the headaches that come with personal car ownership. We believe this is an acute problem worth solving in a massive market, and we have the right DNA to do it.


Team 



Advisors



In addition to our core team, we've assembled an incredible group of engineers, designers, and industry experts who are collaborating with us to create the best service possible. Our partners include the top automotive, software development, and marketing firms in the country, with lots of experience in launching products that redefine entire industries.

YOYO is hiring! Junior-, mid-, and senior-level software engineers, engineering and marketing interns, talented people: come join our core team! Email us at jobs@joinyoyo.com.


This Is NOT Just A Fundraising Campaign! It’s An Exclusive ‘Pre-Sales’ Event.


You see, we at YOYO are going to blow the doors off anything you’ve seen before. We’re offering some crazy perks in celebration of our exciting new announcements.

We have a number of exciting developments in the works that are laying the groundwork for big things to come in 2017. Here’s a look at what we’ve accomplished with YOYO so far:

Product

Much of the heavy lifting is already done. Our customer-facing app is almost ready, and the backend server stuff that will power our service is next on our to-do list. We’ll be ready to deliver cars to our members in just a couple of months after this campaign closes.

Building Relationships
Our stable of procurement, insurance, logistics, technology development, and marketing partners includes the biggest names in the automotive industry. They are excited to work with us and have a huge physical and operational footprint in the markets we want to serve. This will help us scale without the need for expensive infrastructure. Unlike other asset-heavy car startups, YoYo will only need a fraction of the capital to reach our goal of serving 1 million members in the next 5 years.


That’s Awesome—But Why Am I Reading This On Indiegogo?


Crowdfunding is the perfect way to bring you this unique service, and Indiegogo is the perfect platform to facilitate pre-sales of YOYO memberships in celebration of the next chapter in our journey.

We've set a modest goal of $25,000 for this campaign. These are not revenue $'s in the sense that we'll spend towards the development of the service (in fact we're going to escrow most of the funds and make them refundable. Please see below). Our primary objective of this campaign is social proof. In other words, your support enables us to show investors that there’s a market for this service and customers are voting with their wallets. 

We’re offering you membership perks at a special price that is exclusive to this campaign. Not to mention some really nutso no- brainer perks that we don’t think we’ll ever repeat anywhere. Check out our Perks and Stretch Goals sections for those. 

Perks



Stretch Goals


To thank you for helping us reach our goals, we’ve decided to do something really crazy! Instead of just getting free memberships and t-shirts and trips, we’re going to DRAMATICALLY lower your cost of driving permanently. I mean, that’s the whole point here, right? A better (and cheaper) way to drive, right? So we figured we’d go all out for our supporters and do just that. 

For each stretch goal we hit (see image below), we knock 10% of your cost of driving with YOYO. What this means is, the crowd (that’s you folks) collectively works to lower the cost of driving for everyone in the crowd. For example, if you as our tribe help us reach the modest goal of $150,000, as our token of appreciation, everyone who contributes $100 or over during this campaign will pay ONLY HALF as much as anyone else who joins outside of this campaign. I bet you that’s way lower than what you’re paying for your car right now. Don’t miss this chance for saving literally hundreds of dollars every month for as long as you’re a YOYO member. And we don’t intend to repeat this craziness ever again. Please support us and lock in your lifetime driving discounts.




Got Trust Issues?

We know. You've backed a crowd-funded project before and that was the last you heard of it. Plus moving cars around is far more expensive than making widgets. So how do you know backing this project will actually lead to a finished product?

We have a rock solid team that is 100% behind this effort. Given the gray hair and decades of experience each of us brings to the table, we are uniquely qualified to disrupt this massive $1.5 trillion industry. Not just internally, but our world-class network of investors, advisors and partners that is supporting us in revolutionizing the 100-year old broken car industry.

We are senior level guys who have built long careers building huge disruptive things and successfully bringing them to market. And we’re not about to screw up that. We have a habit of working on world-changing things, disrupting the status quo and we’re doing this on a big scale.

And there is a massive appetite out there for this service. From hundreds of conversations we’ve had over the last year with folks around the country, our model resonates with everyone. People are dying to have a service like this. It just plain makes sense for us to get smarter about how we consume cars.


Your Contributions Are Refundable

We know we’re asking you to take a chance with a startup like YOYO. So all contributions of  $100 or more  are completely refundable until such time we begin operations in your geographical market. 

We want you to be part of this revolution!


Beyond Money - We Need Your Help Spreading The Word

At it’s heart, YOYO is a grassroots movement to forever change the car industry. In as little as 10 years from now, we’ll all look back and shake our heads at just how inefficient the car industry and our consumption of cars really is. Paying through the nose for a depreciating hunk of metal in our driveways will seem barbaric compared to the future we envision. We hope to make YOYO the smartest way to access cars. We are working hard to bring the future to today. We've come a long way, but now we need your help. Whether you donate to our campaign or not, you can still help make history. Please spread the word. We’ll not only thank you for it, we’ll reward you handsomely for it, with ongoing monthly checks.

If you do decide to support our cause financially, your support will allow us to finish building all the pieces of the service so we can make YOYO available to you and the millions of people who are frustrated with never-ending bills, don’t have reliable access to good cars, are locked into expensive contracts and have been getting screwed by mechanics for a long time. Let's change how we “do” cars in this country. Let’s make cars a utility that we turn on and turn off whenever we want, let’s stop the insanity of paying for things we don’t use or need, let’s stop getting taken advantage of, let’s get our freedom back – together.



All We Need Now Is YOU


Any Questions?


Despite our gift for comprehensive, informative, entertaining (and exhaustively lengthy) prose, there’s almost no chance that all of your questions on this endeavor have been answered. It’s a big undertaking unlike anything the automotive world has taken on, so there’s a lot to take in. To help out, we’ve put together some FAQ (frequently asked questions...just in case “What does FAQ stand for?” was one of your questions). If you still have question marks occupying comic-esque thought bubbles over your noggin, chime in via the Comments section. 


Joining YOYO

1. What are the eligibility requirements to join YOYO?

Anyone 25 or over with a valid license and clean driving record can become a member. There is a super-quick application process that you can initiate either from the website, or better yet, right from the YOYO app on your phone. It only takes a few minutes.

2. How do I join YOYO?

This is how easy it is to join YOYO. 

Step 1 - one-click signup right in the YOYO smartphone app using your social credentials. With your permission, we quickly check your driving record and get you approved. 

Step 2 - once approved, you pick the car you want right in the app, we deliver it to you at a time and place that works for you. 

Step 3 - time for a different car? Just press a button and we’ll swap out the car you have with a different one of your choice.

3. How long does it take to become a member?

It just takes minutes. Just signup online or on your mobile app.

4. How does the 30-day trial work?

Join YOYO and try it out for 30 days. If it's not for you, we'll refund your membership fee. We just know you are going to love YOYO so we are willing to give you a guarantee. Here are the rules:

- Trial applies only to the membership fee.

- Trial does not apply to driving costs.

- Trial available for new members only. Members re-opening accounts are not eligible for the trial.

- If a coupon is redeemed and membership is cancelled within 30 days, the coupon becomes void and all driving will be charged to the member.

- Trial not valid for accounts with a discounted rate plan 

- 30 days start once your membership application has been submitted to YOYO.

If you choose to relinquish your membership within the first 30 days, call us and we'll refund your membership fee.

5. Do you offer corporate YOYO memberships?

Yes, YOYO for Corporate is a great money- and time-saving alternative to taxis, car services, rental cars, employee reimbursement and company fleets. YOYO provides you with concierge-service access to a diverse fleet of cars 24/7.

6. Can I join if I have a driver's license from outside the US or Canada?

We accept drivers from every country.  You will simply need to complete a form attesting to your driving history and submit it to us with some additional documentation.  Please contact us for details.

7. Is YOYO in my area?

We're launching in the San Francisco Bay Area to start with. After a couple of months of testing and tweaking our service to make sure you'll be absolutely ecstatic with it, we'll roll it out everywhere.

Here's the deal - as soon as we have 1,000 early membership signups in a city, we will launch our service there! You literally have a say in how soon YOYO comes to your location.

8. How do I receive my first vehicle?

Once your application is accepted, your YOYO concierge will work with you to deliver your first vehicle. We recommend you set aside at least 30 minutes for your first delivery so we can answer any questions and show you the ropes. We will have you behind the wheel within a couple of days.

9. Will you run a credit check after I apply?

We trust you. No, we're not planning on running credit checks.  Unfortunately, our insurance providers make us do pesky things like verify your identity and pull driving history.

Ordering Your Car 

1. How do I reserve a YOYO?

When you want a car, tell us which one right on your mobile app and where you want it delivered, and a YOYO Agent will drive it to you. When you’re done with it, just press a button in the app and we’ll come pick it up.

2. For how long can I book a YOYO?

We've eliminated the concept of time when it comes to getting your car from YOYO. You pay by the mile, not by the day or hour.  We want YOYO to be a replacement for your own car, which you can swap out for any other car you want whenever you want.  In effect, you can keep a YOYO for as little as one day, or as much as 6 months at a time.

3. Can I book a one-way trip with YOYO?

Since YOYO is a concierge service we’ll pick up the car when you’re ready to return it - wherever you may be located at the time.

4. How much mileage is included?

Our pricing works on a per-mile basis. There's really no other ongoing, daily, weekly or monthly fee, so there's nothing to include. You only pay for the miles you drive.

5. What types of vehicles can I drive?

YOYO offers a variety of vehicles including luxury sedans, hybrids and plug-ins, SUVs, trucks, off-road vehicles, performance cars and even vintage vehicles.

A few vehicle highlights:

"TALL" pricing plan:
Sedans: Toyota Prius, Honda Civic, Ford Focus, Ford Fusion, Hyundai Sonata...
SUVs: Dodge Journey, Kia Sorento...
Trucks: GMC Canyon...
Coupes / Convertibles / Classics: Mini Cooper, Ford Mustang, Mazda MX-5 Miata…

"GRANDE" pricing plan:
Sedans: Audi A3, Acura TLX, BMW X1, Mercedes Benz CLA, Lexus NX...
SUVs: Audi Q5, Toyota 4Runner, GMC Acadia, Ford Explorer...
Trucks: Ford F150, Chevy Silverado...
Coupes / Convertibles / Classics: BMW 2 series, Audi Q3…
Minivans: Nissan Quest, Dodge Grand Caravan

"VENTI" pricing plan:
Sedans: Audi A6, BMW 5 Series, Lexus GS 350, Mercedes E350...
SUVs: Audi Q7, BMW X5, Chevrolet Tahoe, GMC Yukon XL, Lexus GX 460, Mercedes M Class, Porsche Macan...
Trucks: Ford F150 Raptor, Chevrolet Silverado...
Coupes / Convertibles:  Audi S5, BMW 4 series, Chevrolet Corvette, Mercedes SLK AMG, Porsche Cayman
Minivans: Chrysler Town & Country, Honda Odyssey, Toyota Sienna

6. What is YOYO's recall policy?

Periodically, automobile manufacturers provide notices of issues relating to their vehicles. These notices range from minor issues to serious problems that may pose a risk to the safety of the driver, passengers and the general public.

In the United States, when YOYO receives a safety recall notice from a vehicle manufacturer under the Motor Vehicle Safety Act, YOYO identifies the affected vehicles in our fleet and removes them from our reservations system, which prevents them from being reserved. These vehicles cannot be used by our members until we are able to implement a remedy that has been approved by the manufacturer and the National Highway Transportation and Safety Administration (NHTSA). Members with future reservations on recalled vehicles will be moved to another car while the issue is addressed

7. How much advance notice is required for a swap?

A 24-hr advance notice is required for a swap. But we'll try to get it to you as quickly as we can, most of the time much faster than 24 hours.

Driving Your Car

1. How do I unlock a YOYO?

Unlike Zipcar, you don’t have to walk anywhere in search of a YOYO car. We bring the car and keys to you.

2. Can I take the car early?

If the vehicle is available and we can work out the logistics, we’ll bring the car earlier to you.

3. What if the car is damaged?

Before you drive off, be sure to take a few minutes to do a thorough walk-around with your YOYO agent to see if there are any dents, scratches or other damage. The YOYO agent will create a photo record of any problem areas, which will be accessible in your mobile app.

You don't want to be held responsible for damage you didn't cause, so please don't forget to check at the start of every reservation.

4. What if the car is dirty or low on fuel?

Your YOYO car should be clean and have a full tank of fuel when you arrive. If there's a problem, we ask that you let your YOYO agent know.

5. Can I extend my reservation?

There's nothing to extend :)  We've eliminated the concept of time when it comes to getting your car from YOYO. You pay by the mile, not by the day or hour.  We want YOYO to be a replacement for your own car, which you can swap out for any other car you want whenever you want.  In effect, you can keep a YOYO for as little as one day, or as much as 6 months at a time.

6. What about tolls?

For your convenience, we will provide toll passes to YOYO in many cities. There's no surcharge for using the passes — we'll just bill your account for the actual toll amount. Please note that it can take up to 3 weeks for toll charges to come in, so you will be billed separately from your reservation.

7. Do you have roadside assistance?

Yes, your YOYO membership includes roadside assistance 24 hours a day, 365 days a year. Just call us or request roadside assistance on your mobile app and we will take care of the details.

8. Can I take my pet in a YOYO car?

Yes, but only when it's kept in a locked pet carrier. Many members are allergic to pet hair so if any happen to escape the pet carrier, please clean it up before your reservation comes to an end.

Service animals used by disabled members or passengers with disabilities are an exception. These animals are allowed in the car without a pet carrier. If you need to bring a service animal into a YOYO car, please let us know in advance.

9. Can I smoke in a YOYO car?

No, smoking damages the cars and can impact the health of other members. For any member found to be smoking in the car, we will charge you for the cost of cleaning the car to make it completely smoke free (minimum $250).

Oh, and holding a cigarette outside the car while driving is STILL considered smoking in the car. Just so you know.

10. Can someone else drive during my reservation?

Only members can drive YOYO cars. If you've got a fellow member along for the ride, it's ok to go ahead and share the driving time. You can also add family or friends to your account so they can drive too.

Non-members are not covered by our insurance. If you allow a non-member to drive during your reservation, it's a serious violation of your member agreement. Not only will you lose your membership, you will also be 100% responsible for repairs if damage occurs to the YOYO car while a non-member is driving. Also, you take on any other liability (e.g. injuries to other people or property) since the reservation is under your name. And that's a bad thing.

11. What if I've left (or found) something in my YOYO?

If you've left something in your YOYO car, call the customer service folks, who will try their best to get your item(s) back. Please remember that YOYO car is not responsible for lost items

If you find an item belonging to another member, please place it in the glove compartment or trunk, and call us to let us know.

12. Can I park in commercial zone during my reservation?

No! Please avoid commercial zone parking areas, or you'll be a sweet target for a parking ticket.

13. Can I drive my YOYO outside of the US?

You cannot drive your YOYO into Mexico. Our insurance policy does not cover driving in Mexico. Violation of this policy will result in termination of your YOYO membership, and significant fines and legal action. (We definitely don't want that, so please keep your car north of the border!).

You can drive your YOYO from the US into Canada, no problem.

14. What if I get a ticket during my reservation?

We'll cover gas and insurance, but you are responsible for legal infractions. If we receive a notice and process a violation, you will be charged a $30 processing fee in addition to the original cost of the ticket.

The best thing to do? Report it.

Call or email us right away and let us know that you received a ticket. Whether you've paid it, or decided to appeal it, we want a record of what's happening. We want to know the date and time the violation was issued, the license plate of the vehicle, the type of violation (speeding, parking, etc), the ticket #, how much it is for and which city gave it to you.

This way if something goes wrong in the payment process, or you encounter glitches, we'll know you've got it covered and we won't just assume you tossed it in the gutter. Note that certain violations may impact insurance coverage, so it's very important to report any violation to YOYO.

What if I don't pay it? If you do not pay a ticket, we will be notified and charge you a $30 processing fee. Additionally, you are responsible for the cost of the ticket. If we can, we will redirect the violation to you. If we can't redirect it, we will pay the fine, along with any late fees and bill the total to your account. Other fines or membership suspension can also result, so please pay the ticket when you get it.

Can I dispute it? If you wish to contest a violation and the issuing municipality allows it, be sure to do so promptly! If we receive a notice in the mail, and you have yet to dispute the ticket with the issuing municipality, we will automatically bill your account for the amount of the violation, plus the processing fee.

15. What if I'm in an accident with my YOYO?

First, make sure that everyone is safe, get your vehicle to a safe place, exchange information with the other parties and notify the police. Once the situation is stabilized, call us. We will bring you a fresh vehicle and handle everything with respect to the vehicle involved in the incident. The HELP! button in your app home screen has a list of what to report during an accident and other helpful information.

16. How well-equipped are YOYO cars?

The majority of vehicles are equipped with a mid to high-end trim package. Most of our vehicles have leather seats. Other options vary by make/model and specific vehicle. We cannot guarantee the availability of certain options.

17. What happens if my vehicles needs repair?

Our goal is that you will never have to worry about maintenance or repair issues. If something unforeseen occurs, use the YOYO app to notify us. We'll bring you a fresh car so you can get back on the road right away, and we'll take the other one away to get the appropriate repairs done.

18. Is there a mileage limit per month?

There is no mileage limit. Drive on!

19. Are members responsible for their YOYO car?

Yes, we expect our members to take care of YOYO vehicles as if they owned them. Please drive responsibly, keep your vehicle clean, and let us know of any minor dings or spills via the YOYO app.

20. What is the condition of YOYO vehicles?

YOYO is committed to delivering vehicles that are in excellent condition. To that end, we use technology to ensure that the vehicles are properly maintained and driven responsibly.

Returning Your Car 

1. Where do I return the YOYO when I am done?

When you’re done with your YOYO, just press a button in the app and we’ll come pick it up.

2. How do I end my reservation?

Please remember to take all your belongings, remove any trash, and leave at least 1/4 tank of fuel for the next member.

3. Do I get credit for returning the car early?

Our service is not time-based. You pay for the miles you drive, and not for the hours or days you have a YOYO car. So, the concept of returning the car early (or late) doesn't really exist when you're a YOYO member. Happy worry-free driving  :)

4. What happens if I return the car late?

Nothing. See #3 above.

5. What happens if I return the car dirty or with low fuel?

The whole idea behind YOYO is that you don't have to care about things like maintaining, cleaning and worrying about gassing up before returning the car. We ask that you treat our cars with respect, just like you would treat yours. Other than that, just relax...we'll take care of it.

Insurance

1. What's the insurance coverage?

Every member in good standing who complies with the membership contract is covered while driving a YOYO. Here are the highlights:

- Third party auto liability coverage*

- Members age 25+ receive liability coverage of 100/300/25 ($100,000 bodily injury per person, $300,000 bodily injury maximum, $25,000 property damage). We provide Personal Injury Protection (PIP), or "no-fault" coverage, at the level required by the jurisdiction in which the accident occurs.

- Members are responsible for a $1,000 damage fee per incident, which can be reduced or eliminated with the purchase of an optional damage fee waiver.

*Please note that coverage may be provided under a certificate of self-insurance, insurance policy, or both.

Billing & Membership

1. What is the YOYO joining fee?

The regular membership fee is $300/year. By signing up during this limited-time promotion campaign you get a lifetime membership for a one-time payment of $99.

2. What is the minimum commitment to drive YOYO?

Think of it like a public library where you check out and check in books. YOYO works the same way. For each day you "check out" a car, you are expected to drive a minimum of 30 miles.

So, say you have a YOYO car for 5 days. In that case, your obligation is $150, regardless of which day or days you drive (or don't drive). But the 30 miles don't need to be drive every single day. The miles roll over, as long as they add up to at least 150 for the 5 day period.

It's actually better than that - we only do this once a month, at the end of your billing period. We compare how many days you had a car "checked out" that month and how many miles you drove. If it's above the minimum level for the # of days you had the car, we're good. If there's a shortfall, we just add the missing miles to your bill that month.

In case this is not clear, please reach out to our customer service team, and we'll be happy to explain further.

3. When will I be charged for my annual membership fee?

We will charge the annual membership fee every year on the anniversary of your membership, unless you let us know that you’d like to cancel your YOYO membership.

4. When is the per-mile usage fee due?

On your billing date, we will charge your credit card on file for the per-mile usage fee due. We meant it when we said no surprises. You can find your running balance every day on our website and in the YOYO app on your phone.

5. When will I be charged for reserving a YOYO?

We automatically charge your credit card at the end of your billing period (not when you order your car) for the amount you owe, based on the number of miles you drove that month.

6. How can I cancel my membership?

If you want to cancel your YOYO membership, just reach out to our awesome customer service folks and they'll take care of you. You can do that via live chat on the site, or over the phone, or via email. Just let us know how we can help, and we will do just that.
story_txt:
Access An Entire Fleet of Cars For Less Than The Cost Of The One You Own Now
MEET YOYO - It's the smartest way to drive.



drive any car you want at any time.


we drop-off / pickup wherever you are.


everything's included in a low per-mile fee.


swap for another car at any time.


save hundreds over car ownership.


no insurance hassles, repair bills or even trips to the gas station.





Check us out at joinyoyo.com







Own a car? Please let us start by extending our empathy -- we too
have experienced the ongoing love-hate relationship challenges that
come with car ownership.
On the one hand, we all bought into the concept that owning a car
would be the ultimate symbol of our freedom and independence. But
then on the other there’s the reality of expensive monthly bills,
insurance premiums, maintenance, regular oil changes, rising gas
costs, and overpriced repair bills.

That’s why we created YOYO: The revolutionary new on-demand
service giving drivers everywhere a better alternative to car
ownership.

YOYO provides on-demand, pay-per-mile access to an entire fleet of
personal vehicles without any of the hassles that come with
traditional car ownership -- empowering car owners to ditch their
cars while keeping their freedom. 


Ditch Your Car. Keep Your Freedom.




Check us out at joinyoyo.com









The Dead End Road Of Traditional Car Ownership 




 




Remember what it was like becoming a car owner for the very first
time? The shopper’s high in hand-selecting the perfect set of
wheels? The sense of accomplishment after finally closing the deal?
The sudden surge of newfound empowerment and freedom you felt
leaping into the driver’s seat, gripping the wheel, and fantasizing
about the endless possibilities of hightailing it wherever you want,
whenever you want?
Then you wake up and experienced the inevitable, emotional gear-
shift not long after the initial honeymoon phase has burned up its
fuel. The expensive monthly bills and insurance premiums, the
maintenance, the regular oil changes and rising gas costs, the
overpriced repair bills – all begin to kill that dream.
Do you know what your car actually costs you every month? Do you
know how much you pay for each mile you drive? When asked
about their monthly car costs, most people only consider their car
payment, which on average is around $482. But that $482 isn’t the
whole cost to own that car — far from it.
We almost always overlook all the other sneaky car-related leaks
from our wallets. We have license fees, registration fees and taxes.
We need to buy insurance, fill the gas tank, go in for regular
maintenance. And our cars lose value from depreciation every day
we own it.
These other costs could well end up doubling our out-of-pocket
expenses. That’s NUTS! Especially given the fact that we drive our
cars, on average, 56 minutes a day - that’s just 4% of the time! 











We’re right there with you.

We realized too that our cars that used to be the ultimate symbol of
freedom and independence are actually really lousy assets to own.
And it turns out we’re not alone.
There are over 100 million households in the US who own 230
million cars. We collectively spend over $1.5 TRILLION (yes, that’s a
T) on our cars. We started YOYO because believe that as much as a
third of this money that we consumers spend is just fat in a
ridiculously inefficient system. To add insult to injury, it's a rigged
system and the inefficiencies are totally artificial.
The reality is that more and more folks like you look at car ownership
as an expensive burden more than anything else. You value your
time over physical assets. That’s exactly why Uber, Lyft, ZipCar, and
other modern transportation alternatives are taking off like
gangbusters.
The times certainly are a-changin’ and the sharing economy is taking
hold fast and furious throughout the United States -- but relying on
these kinds of services on a full-time basis just isn’t doable for most
consumers’ pocketbooks. 


A Better Way To Get Moving

With YOYO, we’ve figured out a way that you can completely liberate
yourself from all of these pain points while still maintaining that
sense of freedom and independence that lies at the heart of the car
ownership philosophy.
Tired of paying an arm and a leg for monthly car payments,
insurance premiums, oil changes, and gas costs? Yeah. So are we.
With YOYO, you’re free from all of these expenses. Everything is
included in a single, per-mile fee -- where you pay only for the miles
you actually drive!
Ready to ditch the car depreciating in your driveway while keeping
all of your freedom?
Hop in, buckle up, and join us for the ride! 





Easy As 1, 2, 3...





YOYO provides you with flexible access to an entire fleet of cars for
less than the cost of owning. Our on-demand white-glove concierge
service delivers the right car for the right occasion right to your door.









All it takes is a 1-click, super-fast sign up from our mobile app using
your social credentials, and we make it easier than ever to begin
reaping the all of the many benefits that YOYO offers.
The pains of paying an arm and a leg for monthly car bills and
astronomical insurance premiums? GONE!
Astronomical insurance premiums and complicated claims
processes for minor fender-benders? HISTORY!
The vulnerability of getting swindled by repair shop mechanics?
NEVER AGAIN! 




What You Get With YOYO


















Here’s what YOYO members stand to gain from our service:





Complete on-demand, flexible access to an entire fleet of cars.
With YoYo, you can take a sedan to the office during the week, trade
it for an SUV for the family camping trip over the weekend, and then
swap it out for a convertible to escort your better half on a swanky
night out on the town. Or for you single parents out there, while that
minivan is perfectly practical for shuttling the kids around, wouldn’t it
be great if you could roll up to your date’s house in something just a
little bit sexier? The options are limitless.
A hassle-free, white-glove concierge service.
We’ll send out a YOYO agent to deliver your selected set of wheels
right to you -- whenever you want, wherever you are. When you’re
finished with it, you can either drop it off at our place or press a
button and one of our agents will pick it up for you -- with an option
to swap out for a different car, if it strikes your fancy.
Savings
YOYO members are completely free from purchasing, financing,
insurance, repair, maintenance, DMV registrations, airport parking --
virtually all of the wallet-gouging expenses common to personal car
ownership. You save hundreds over all other alternatives for the
same car, and it’s completely predictable. You get to free up money
for stuff that really matters to you.
Pay-per-mile driving
Our members only pay for the miles that they actually drive. Want to
enjoy a lazy Sunday indoors to catch up on your Netflix? With YOYO,
you can keep your options open while keeping your wallet closed --
because never again will you have to pay a single penny for an idle
car. With YOYO, the family car is finally a true utility that you can turn
on and off whenever you want. That’s a luxury that peer-to-peer
services and traditional car ownership simply CAN’T offer.
Referral rewards
YOYO makes it possible for our members to drive completely for free
over time. Any time you refer one of your friends or family members
to YOYO, you will receive recurring credits and bonuses to lower your
cost of driving. The more people you refer, the more points you earn.
Peace of mind
By letting go of car ownership you’re actually back in the driver’s
seat. Has sort of a Zen ring to it, doesn’t it? The family car is now a
true utility – you can turn it on or off on demand.

Flexible Pricing Plans. No Surprises.
Choose the car that works for you. Our pricing is flexible and totally
variable so you can get, and pay for, exactly what you need. No
decoder ring required.

Our Story
The concept of YOYO was conceived a year ago when Ro’s (one of
the founders) car broke down. Like most consumers not adept with
the complexities of the modern car engine, he was at the mercy of
the repair shop and facing a very large bill. Ro approached his co-
founder Hari, his long-time colleague and go-to auto guru. Hari
intervened and saved him from being taken for thousands of dollars.
After this experience, it became clear to both of them that the car
ownership model is massively broken because of pervasive and
totally artificial information asymmetry at every node in the value
chain. The two began studying the inefficiencies and gaps that exist
in the automotive industry that always seem to put consumers at a
disadvantage. Their attempt to dissolve all the car-related
headaches for the consumer and disrupt a 100-year old ‘broken’ car
consumption model eventually led to the formation and launch of
YOYO.
What we have found is that despite all the “car disruption” noise out
there, people are still facing the headaches that come with personal
car ownership. We believe this is an acute problem worth solving in a
massive market, and we have the right DNA to do it.

Team 






Advisors











In addition to our core team, we've assembled an incredible group of
engineers, designers, and industry experts who are collaborating
with us to create the best service possible. Our partners include the
top automotive, software development, and marketing firms in the
country, with lots of experience in launching products that redefine
entire industries.
YOYO is hiring! Junior-, mid-, and senior-level software engineers,
engineering and marketing interns, talented people: come join our
core team! Email us at jobs@joinyoyo.com.

This Is NOT Just A Fundraising Campaign! It’s An Exclusive
‘Pre-Sales’ Event.

You see, we at YOYO are going to blow the doors off anything
you’ve seen before. We’re offering some crazy perks in celebration
of our exciting new announcements.
We have a number of exciting developments in the works that are
laying the groundwork for big things to come in 2017. Here’s a look
at what we’ve accomplished with YOYO so far:
Product
Much of the heavy lifting is already done. Our customer-facing app
is almost ready, and the backend server stuff that will power our
service is next on our to-do list. We’ll be ready to deliver cars to our
members in just a couple of months after this campaign closes.
Building Relationships
Our stable of procurement, insurance, logistics, technology
development, and marketing partners includes the biggest names in
the automotive industry. They are excited to work with us and have a
huge physical and operational footprint in the markets we want to
serve. This will help us scale without the need for expensive
infrastructure. Unlike other asset-heavy car startups, YoYo will only
need a fraction of the capital to reach our goal of serving 1 million
members in the next 5 years.

That’s Awesome—But Why Am I Reading This On
Indiegogo?

Crowdfunding is the perfect way to bring you this unique service,
and Indiegogo is the perfect platform to facilitate pre-sales of YOYO
memberships in celebration of the next chapter in our journey.
We've set a modest goal of $25,000 for this campaign. These are not revenue $'s in the sense that we'll spend towards the development of the service (in fact we're going to escrow most of the funds and make them refundable. Please see below). Our primary objective of this campaign is social proof. In other words, your support enables us to show investors that there’s a market for this service and customers are voting with their wallets. 
We’re offering you membership perks at a special price that is
exclusive to this campaign. Not to mention some really nutso no-
brainer perks that we don’t think we’ll ever repeat anywhere. Check
out our Perks and Stretch Goals sections for those. 




Perks





Stretch Goals


To thank you for helping us reach our goals, we’ve decided to do something really crazy! Instead of just getting free memberships and t-shirts and trips, we’re going to DRAMATICALLY lower your cost of driving permanently. I mean, that’s the whole point here, right? A better (and cheaper) way to drive, right? So we figured we’d go all out for our supporters and do just that. 
For each stretch goal we hit (see image below), we knock 10% of your cost of driving with YOYO. What this means is, the crowd (that’s you folks) collectively works to lower the cost of driving for everyone in the crowd. For example, if you as our tribe help us reach the modest goal of $150,000, as our token of appreciation, everyone who contributes $100 or over during this campaign will pay ONLY HALF as much as anyone else who joins outside of this campaign. I bet you that’s way lower than what you’re paying for your car right now. Don’t miss this chance for saving literally hundreds of dollars every month for as long as you’re a YOYO member. And we don’t intend to repeat this craziness ever again. Please support us and lock in your lifetime driving discounts.





Got Trust Issues?
We know. You've backed a crowd-funded project before and that was the last you heard of it. Plus moving cars around is far more expensive than making widgets. So how do you know backing this project will actually lead to a finished product?
We have a rock solid team that is 100% behind this effort. Given the gray hair and decades of experience each of us brings to the table, we are uniquely qualified to disrupt this massive $1.5 trillion industry. Not just internally, but our world-class network of investors, advisors and partners that is supporting us in revolutionizing the 100-year old broken car industry.
We are senior level guys who have built long careers building huge disruptive things and successfully bringing them to market. And we’re not about to screw up that. We have a habit of working on world-changing things, disrupting the status quo and we’re doing this on a big scale.
And there is a massive appetite out there for this service. From hundreds of conversations we’ve had over the last year with folks around the country, our model resonates with everyone. People are dying to have a service like this. It just plain makes sense for us to get smarter about how we consume cars.


Your Contributions Are Refundable
We know we’re asking you to take a chance with a startup like YOYO. So all contributions of  $100 or more  are completely refundable until such time we begin operations in your geographical market. 

We want you to be part of this revolution!


Beyond Money - We Need Your Help Spreading The Word
At it’s heart, YOYO is a grassroots movement to forever change the car industry. In as little as 10 years from now, we’ll all look back and shake our heads at just how inefficient the car industry and our consumption of cars really is. Paying through the nose for a depreciating hunk of metal in our driveways will seem barbaric compared to the future we envision. We hope to make YOYO the smartest way to access cars. We are working hard to bring the future to today. We've come a long way, but now we need your help. Whether you donate to our campaign or not, you can still help make history. Please spread the word. We’ll not only thank you for it, we’ll reward you handsomely for it, with ongoing monthly checks.
If you do decide to support our cause financially, your support will allow us to finish building all the pieces of the service so we can make YOYO available to you and the millions of people who are frustrated with never-ending bills, don’t have reliable access to good cars, are locked into expensive contracts and have been getting screwed by mechanics for a long time. Let's change how we “do” cars in this country. Let’s make cars a utility that we turn on and turn off whenever we want, let’s stop the insanity of paying for things we don’t use or need, let’s stop getting taken advantage of, let’s get our freedom back – together.


All We Need Now Is YOU

Any Questions?


Despite our gift for comprehensive, informative, entertaining (and
exhaustively lengthy) prose, there’s almost no chance that all of your
questions on this endeavor have been answered. It’s a big
undertaking unlike anything the automotive world has taken on, so
there’s a lot to take in. To help out, we’ve put together some FAQ
(frequently asked questions...just in case “What does FAQ stand
for?” was one of your questions). If you still have question marks
occupying comic-esque thought bubbles over your noggin, chime in
via the Comments section. 


Joining YOYO

1. What are the eligibility requirements to join YOYO?
Anyone 25 or over with a valid license and clean driving record can become a member. There is a super-quick application process that you can initiate either from the website, or better yet, right from the YOYO app on your phone. It only takes a few minutes.
2. How do I join YOYO?
This is how easy it is to join YOYO. Step 1 - one-click signup right in the YOYO smartphone app using your social credentials. With your permission, we quickly check your driving record and get you approved. Step 2 - once approved, you pick the car you want right in the app, we deliver it to you at a time and place that works for you. Step 3 - time for a different car? Just press a button and we’ll swap out the car you have with a different one of your choice.
3. How long does it take to become a member?
It just takes minutes. Just signup online or on your mobile app.
4. How does the 30-day trial work?
Join YOYO and try it out for 30 days. If it's not for you, we'll refund your membership fee. We just know you are going to love YOYO so we are willing to give you a guarantee. Here are the rules:
- Trial applies only to the membership fee.
- Trial does not apply to driving costs.
- Trial available for new members only. Members re-opening accounts are not eligible for the trial.
- If a coupon is redeemed and membership is cancelled within 30 days, the coupon becomes void and all driving will be charged to the member.
- Trial not valid for accounts with a discounted rate plan 
- 30 days start once your membership application has been submitted to YOYO.
If you choose to relinquish your membership within the first 30 days, call us and we'll refund your membership fee.
5. Do you offer corporate YOYO memberships?
Yes, YOYO for Corporate is a great money- and time-saving alternative to taxis, car services, rental cars, employee reimbursement and company fleets. YOYO provides you with concierge-service access to a diverse fleet of cars 24/7.
6. Can I join if I have a driver's license from outside the US or Canada?
We accept drivers from every country.  You will simply need to complete a form attesting to your driving history and submit it to us with some additional documentation.  Please contact us for details.
7. Is YOYO in my area?
We're launching in the San Francisco Bay Area to start with. After a couple of months of testing and tweaking our service to make sure you'll be absolutely ecstatic with it, we'll roll it out everywhere.
Here's the deal - as soon as we have 1,000 early membership signups in a city, we will launch our service there! You literally have a say in how soon YOYO comes to your location.
8. How do I receive my first vehicle?
Once your application is accepted, your YOYO concierge will work with you to deliver your first vehicle. We recommend you set aside at least 30 minutes for your first delivery so we can answer any questions and show you the ropes. We will have you behind the wheel within a couple of days.
9. Will you run a credit check after I apply?
We trust you. No, we're not planning on running credit checks.  Unfortunately, our insurance providers make us do pesky things like verify your identity and pull driving history.
Ordering Your Car 
1. How do I reserve a YOYO?
When you want a car, tell us which one right on your mobile app and where you want it delivered, and a YOYO Agent will drive it to you. When you’re done with it, just press a button in the app and we’ll come pick it up.
2. For how long can I book a YOYO?
We've eliminated the concept of time when it comes to getting your car from YOYO. You pay by the mile, not by the day or hour.  We want YOYO to be a replacement for your own car, which you can swap out for any other car you want whenever you want.  In effect, you can keep a YOYO for as little as one day, or as much as 6 months at a time.
3. Can I book a one-way trip with YOYO?
Since YOYO is a concierge service we’ll pick up the car when you’re ready to return it - wherever you may be located at the time.
4. How much mileage is included?
Our pricing works on a per-mile basis. There's really no other ongoing, daily, weekly or monthly fee, so there's nothing to include. You only pay for the miles you drive.
5. What types of vehicles can I drive?
YOYO offers a variety of vehicles including luxury sedans, hybrids and plug-ins, SUVs, trucks, off-road vehicles, performance cars and even vintage vehicles.
A few vehicle highlights:
"TALL" pricing plan:Sedans: Toyota Prius, Honda Civic, Ford Focus, Ford Fusion, Hyundai Sonata...SUVs: Dodge Journey, Kia Sorento...Trucks: GMC Canyon...Coupes / Convertibles / Classics: Mini Cooper, Ford Mustang, Mazda MX-5 Miata…
"GRANDE" pricing plan:Sedans: Audi A3, Acura TLX, BMW X1, Mercedes Benz CLA, Lexus NX...SUVs: Audi Q5, Toyota 4Runner, GMC Acadia, Ford Explorer...Trucks: Ford F150, Chevy Silverado...Coupes / Convertibles / Classics: BMW 2 series, Audi Q3…Minivans: Nissan Quest, Dodge Grand Caravan
"VENTI" pricing plan:Sedans: Audi A6, BMW 5 Series, Lexus GS 350, Mercedes E350...SUVs: Audi Q7, BMW X5, Chevrolet Tahoe, GMC Yukon XL, Lexus GX 460, Mercedes M Class, Porsche Macan...Trucks: Ford F150 Raptor, Chevrolet Silverado...Coupes / Convertibles:  Audi S5, BMW 4 series, Chevrolet Corvette, Mercedes SLK AMG, Porsche CaymanMinivans: Chrysler Town & Country, Honda Odyssey, Toyota Sienna
6. What is YOYO's recall policy?
Periodically, automobile manufacturers provide notices of issues relating to their vehicles. These notices range from minor issues to serious problems that may pose a risk to the safety of the driver, passengers and the general public.
In the United States, when YOYO receives a safety recall notice from a vehicle manufacturer under the Motor Vehicle Safety Act, YOYO identifies the affected vehicles in our fleet and removes them from our reservations system, which prevents them from being reserved. These vehicles cannot be used by our members until we are able to implement a remedy that has been approved by the manufacturer and the National Highway Transportation and Safety Administration (NHTSA). Members with future reservations on recalled vehicles will be moved to another car while the issue is addressed
7. How much advance notice is required for a swap?
A 24-hr advance notice is required for a swap. But we'll try to get it to you as quickly as we can, most of the time much faster than 24 hours.

Driving Your Car
1. How do I unlock a YOYO?
Unlike Zipcar, you don’t have to walk anywhere in search of a YOYO car. We bring the car and keys to you.
2. Can I take the car early?
If the vehicle is available and we can work out the logistics, we’ll bring the car earlier to you.
3. What if the car is damaged?
Before you drive off, be sure to take a few minutes to do a thorough walk-around with your YOYO agent to see if there are any dents, scratches or other damage. The YOYO agent will create a photo record of any problem areas, which will be accessible in your mobile app.
You don't want to be held responsible for damage you didn't cause, so please don't forget to check at the start of every reservation.
4. What if the car is dirty or low on fuel?
Your YOYO car should be clean and have a full tank of fuel when you arrive. If there's a problem, we ask that you let your YOYO agent know.
5. Can I extend my reservation?
There's nothing to extend :)  We've eliminated the concept of time when it comes to getting your car from YOYO. You pay by the mile, not by the day or hour.  We want YOYO to be a replacement for your own car, which you can swap out for any other car you want whenever you want.  In effect, you can keep a YOYO for as little as one day, or as much as 6 months at a time.
6. What about tolls?
For your convenience, we will provide toll passes to YOYO in many cities. There's no surcharge for using the passes — we'll just bill your account for the actual toll amount. Please note that it can take up to 3 weeks for toll charges to come in, so you will be billed separately from your reservation.
7. Do you have roadside assistance?
Yes, your YOYO membership includes roadside assistance 24 hours a day, 365 days a year. Just call us or request roadside assistance on your mobile app and we will take care of the details.
8. Can I take my pet in a YOYO car?
Yes, but only when it's kept in a locked pet carrier. Many members are allergic to pet hair so if any happen to escape the pet carrier, please clean it up before your reservation comes to an end.
Service animals used by disabled members or passengers with disabilities are an exception. These animals are allowed in the car without a pet carrier. If you need to bring a service animal into a YOYO car, please let us know in advance.
9. Can I smoke in a YOYO car?
No, smoking damages the cars and can impact the health of other members. For any member found to be smoking in the car, we will charge you for the cost of cleaning the car to make it completely smoke free (minimum $250).
Oh, and holding a cigarette outside the car while driving is STILL considered smoking in the car. Just so you know.
10. Can someone else drive during my reservation?
Only members can drive YOYO cars. If you've got a fellow member along for the ride, it's ok to go ahead and share the driving time. You can also add family or friends to your account so they can drive too.
Non-members are not covered by our insurance. If you allow a non-member to drive during your reservation, it's a serious violation of your member agreement. Not only will you lose your membership, you will also be 100% responsible for repairs if damage occurs to the YOYO car while a non-member is driving. Also, you take on any other liability (e.g. injuries to other people or property) since the reservation is under your name. And that's a bad thing.
11. What if I've left (or found) something in my YOYO?
If you've left something in your YOYO car, call the customer service folks, who will try their best to get your item(s) back. Please remember that YOYO car is not responsible for lost items
If you find an item belonging to another member, please place it in the glove compartment or trunk, and call us to let us know.
12. Can I park in commercial zone during my reservation?
No! Please avoid commercial zone parking areas, or you'll be a sweet target for a parking ticket.
13. Can I drive my YOYO outside of the US?
You cannot drive your YOYO into Mexico. Our insurance policy does not cover driving in Mexico. Violation of this policy will result in termination of your YOYO membership, and significant fines and legal action. (We definitely don't want that, so please keep your car north of the border!).
You can drive your YOYO from the US into Canada, no problem.
14. What if I get a ticket during my reservation?
We'll cover gas and insurance, but you are responsible for legal infractions. If we receive a notice and process a violation, you will be charged a $30 processing fee in addition to the original cost of the ticket.
The best thing to do? Report it.
Call or email us right away and let us know that you received a ticket. Whether you've paid it, or decided to appeal it, we want a record of what's happening. We want to know the date and time the violation was issued, the license plate of the vehicle, the type of violation (speeding, parking, etc), the ticket #, how much it is for and which city gave it to you.
This way if something goes wrong in the payment process, or you encounter glitches, we'll know you've got it covered and we won't just assume you tossed it in the gutter. Note that certain violations may impact insurance coverage, so it's very important to report any violation to YOYO.
What if I don't pay it? If you do not pay a ticket, we will be notified and charge you a $30 processing fee. Additionally, you are responsible for the cost of the ticket. If we can, we will redirect the violation to you. If we can't redirect it, we will pay the fine, along with any late fees and bill the total to your account. Other fines or membership suspension can also result, so please pay the ticket when you get it.
Can I dispute it? If you wish to contest a violation and the issuing municipality allows it, be sure to do so promptly! If we receive a notice in the mail, and you have yet to dispute the ticket with the issuing municipality, we will automatically bill your account for the amount of the violation, plus the processing fee.
15. What if I'm in an accident with my YOYO?
First, make sure that everyone is safe, get your vehicle to a safe place, exchange information with the other parties and notify the police. Once the situation is stabilized, call us. We will bring you a fresh vehicle and handle everything with respect to the vehicle involved in the incident. The HELP! button in your app home screen has a list of what to report during an accident and other helpful information.
16. How well-equipped are YOYO cars?
The majority of vehicles are equipped with a mid to high-end trim package. Most of our vehicles have leather seats. Other options vary by make/model and specific vehicle. We cannot guarantee the availability of certain options.
17. What happens if my vehicles needs repair?
Our goal is that you will never have to worry about maintenance or repair issues. If something unforeseen occurs, use the YOYO app to notify us. We'll bring you a fresh car so you can get back on the road right away, and we'll take the other one away to get the appropriate repairs done.
18. Is there a mileage limit per month?
There is no mileage limit. Drive on!
19. Are members responsible for their YOYO car?
Yes, we expect our members to take care of YOYO vehicles as if they owned them. Please drive responsibly, keep your vehicle clean, and let us know of any minor dings or spills via the YOYO app.
20. What is the condition of YOYO vehicles?
YOYO is committed to delivering vehicles that are in excellent condition. To that end, we use technology to ensure that the vehicles are properly maintained and driven responsibly.
Returning Your Car 
1. Where do I return the YOYO when I am done?
When you’re done with your YOYO, just press a button in the app and we’ll come pick it up.
2. How do I end my reservation?
Please remember to take all your belongings, remove any trash, and leave at least 1/4 tank of fuel for the next member.
3. Do I get credit for returning the car early?
Our service is not time-based. You pay for the miles you drive, and not for the hours or days you have a YOYO car. So, the concept of returning the car early (or late) doesn't really exist when you're a YOYO member. Happy worry-free driving  :)
4. What happens if I return the car late?
Nothing. See #3 above.
5. What happens if I return the car dirty or with low fuel?
The whole idea behind YOYO is that you don't have to care about things like maintaining, cleaning and worrying about gassing up before returning the car. We ask that you treat our cars with respect, just like you would treat yours. Other than that, just relax...we'll take care of it.

Insurance
1. What's the insurance coverage?
Every member in good standing who complies with the membership contract is covered while driving a YOYO. Here are the highlights:
- Third party auto liability coverage*
- Members age 25+ receive liability coverage of 100/300/25 ($100,000 bodily injury per person, $300,000 bodily injury maximum, $25,000 property damage). We provide Personal Injury Protection (PIP), or "no-fault" coverage, at the level required by the jurisdiction in which the accident occurs.
- Members are responsible for a $1,000 damage fee per incident, which can be reduced or eliminated with the purchase of an optional damage fee waiver.
*Please note that coverage may be provided under a certificate of self-insurance, insurance policy, or both.
Billing & Membership
1. What is the YOYO joining fee?
The regular membership fee is $300/year. By signing up during this limited-time promotion campaign you get a lifetime membership for a one-time payment of $99.
2. What is the minimum commitment to drive YOYO?
Think of it like a public library where you check out and check in books. YOYO works the same way. For each day you "check out" a car, you are expected to drive a minimum of 30 miles.
So, say you have a YOYO car for 5 days. In that case, your obligation is $150, regardless of which day or days you drive (or don't drive). But the 30 miles don't need to be drive every single day. The miles roll over, as long as they add up to at least 150 for the 5 day period.
It's actually better than that - we only do this once a month, at the end of your billing period. We compare how many days you had a car "checked out" that month and how many miles you drove. If it's above the minimum level for the # of days you had the car, we're good. If there's a shortfall, we just add the missing miles to your bill that month.
In case this is not clear, please reach out to our customer service team, and we'll be happy to explain further.
3. When will I be charged for my annual membership fee?
We will charge the annual membership fee every year on the anniversary of your membership, unless you let us know that you’d like to cancel your YOYO membership.
4. When is the per-mile usage fee due?
On your billing date, we will charge your credit card on file for the per-mile usage fee due. We meant it when we said no surprises. You can find your running balance every day on our website and in the YOYO app on your phone.
5. When will I be charged for reserving a YOYO?
We automatically charge your credit card at the end of your billing period (not when you order your car) for the amount you owe, based on the number of miles you drove that month.

6. How can I cancel my membership?
If you want to cancel your YOYO membership, just reach out to our awesome customer service folks and they'll take care of you. You can do that via live chat on the site, or over the phone, or via email. Just let us know how we can help, and we will do just that.

story:
Do you remember a favorite brand of your childhood? A memory of a t-shirt or pair of shoes you couldn't live without. Even when it was torn and worn or on its final leg your bond to that item never wore away. 

The GRIPPITZ brand is made for enjoyment and puts the fun in FUNctional quality apparel. With our innovative construction and cool designs every child can bond with the pond! Our famous zen frog adorns every garment along with our unique and versatile grip technology. 

 

The key components behind our stylish gripper sock are in both construction and design. Breathable moisture wicking panels along the top and non slip PVC grip on the bottoms allow for comfortable and functional movement. Active elastic ankle bands and dynamic arch stitching firmly hold the sock on the foot during play. All socks are made of 70% performance polyester, 17% breathable spandex, and 7% dynamic elastic.

We are offering 3 sizes for our initial order: Toddler, Child, and Small. 

Our 5 exciting color choices are Green Tree Frog, Barking Frog Black, Pixie Frog Pink, Growling Frog Gold, Bull Frog Blue, and Rana Frog Red. 

 

GRIPPITZ brand was originated initially to solve a growing problem in children's footwear for trampoline parks. The lack of design innovation, quality construction, and consumer connection created a massive amount of under performing socks in the marketplace. The goal was to create a product that was not only internationally recognized but accepted at every trampoline park. When the final construction was perfected a brand emerged. GRIPPITZ added a fun and recognizable design that relates to its market, kids. Constantly growing, GRIPPITZ added two new and essential products to its line of apparel, gloves and beanies.

GRIPPITZ grip socks have gone through rigorous sampling and testing to reach it's final production stage. With this campaign GRIPPITZ can become a household trusted brand across the world. Our initial order will fulfill our campaign supporters and build an inventory for in-store retail orders. Supporters also have the chance to be the first to own our brand new GRIPPITZ Grip Gloves and Beanie. Our future lines will consist of shirts, hats, toe socks, hoodies, onesies, shoes and more.
story_txt: Do you remember a favorite brand of your childhood? A memory of a t-shirt or pair of shoes you couldn't live without. Even when it was torn and worn or on its final leg your bond to that item never wore away. The GRIPPITZ brand is made for enjoyment and puts the fun in FUNctional quality apparel. With our innovative construction and cool designs every child can bond with the pond! Our famous zen frog adorns every garment along with our unique and versatile grip technology.  The key components behind our stylish gripper sock are in both construction and design. Breathable moisture wicking panels along the top and non slip PVC grip on the bottoms allow for comfortable and functional movement. Active elastic ankle bands and dynamic arch stitching firmly hold the sock on the foot during play. All socks are made of 70% performance polyester, 17% breathable spandex, and 7% dynamic elastic.We are offering 3 sizes for our initial order: Toddler, Child, and Small. Our 5 exciting color choices are Green Tree Frog, Barking Frog Black, Pixie Frog Pink, Growling Frog Gold, Bull Frog Blue, and Rana Frog Red.  GRIPPITZ brand was originated initially to solve a growing problem in children's footwear for trampoline parks. The lack of design innovation, quality construction, and consumer connection created a massive amount of under performing socks in the marketplace. The goal was to create a product that was not only internationally recognized but accepted at every trampoline park. When the final construction was perfected a brand emerged. Supporters also have the chance to be the first to own our brand new GRIPPITZ Grip Gloves and Beanie. Our future lines will consist of shirts, hats, toe socks, hoodies, onesies, shoes and more.

story:
Why Support The Social Cut? 

We’ve got the place and now it’s the time to build this one-of-a-kind man grooming haven in Downtown Pomona! I thought to myself, "If the community would pitch in to what we already have, imagine how much more amazing we can make this place for our future customers?"

The funding will help cover the cost for necessary upgrades to the plumbing, electrical, equipment and social area for customers to enjoy coffee (did we mention we're planning FREE WIFI?!).

We want everyone supporting The Social Cut to feel as a part of what we’re doing, to feel at home and to be able to walk into The Social Cut and say, “We helped build this place, this is our place”. So check out our supporter pledge packages, there's a pledge level for everyone. In addition to standard services, our supporters can get their name, social media handle or company name added to The Social Cut appreciation wall. And we have some pretty nice incentives added to our pledge levels that’ll definitely make it worth your while!

So join us in building this one-of-a-kind place by pledging to one of our supporter levels. You’ll be glad you were with us since the beginning!

Why Downtown Pomona?

You can find trendy cafes all throughout the LA area, including the Arts District, Silver Lake, Echo Park, etc., but there are few options once you travel east. We're not only looking to fill that void, but we're also bringing men's grooming and tailoring services to the mix. So, we've chosen Downtown Pomona as the official home of The Social Cut. Downtown Pomona is home to the famous Fox Theatre and has an arts village filled with fashion-forward, creative trendsetters as well as a large professional population working at the nearby courthouse, City Hall, and office buildings. It’s been great seeing this city undergo revitalization with new shops, restaurants and festivals in recent years, so our goal is to bring to the thriving and trendy neighborhood of Downtown Pomona what it’s missing: the convenience of a full service barbershop, tailor and cafe. The Social Cut is here to provide the community with the best service, a cool spot to relax at, great tasting coffee and a place to get the best men's grooming from head-to-toe.

What We Need & What You Get

We have a great design team that has mapped out the perfect layout for The Social Cut!  But, as with any new brick-and-mortar business, there are a lot of costly improvements that need to get done. We're looking to raise at least $5,000. Your contribution will help pay for the necessary electrical and plumbing work, coffee equipment and social space furniture. 

Check out our various pledge packages to find out how you can get involved!  Each and every supporter will receive an invitation to our VIP grand opening event and be featured on our social media. In addition to standard services, our supporters can get their name, social media handle, or company name added to The Social Cut sponsor wall. Each pledge level has different incentives and services, so check them out!

Risks & Challenges

You can't beat the beauty of this 1930's Art Deco building and its beautiful, historic downtown setting. But as they say, you never know what issue you will encounter when you're in construction. So while we are planning to use the funds raised to help pay for a few necessary upgrades to the electrical, equipment and social space, we may use the funds to pay for those unforeseen 'construction surprises' typical to old buildings.

You also can't be sure you won't run into a challenge or two as you open your doors for business. But don't worry! We've got an extensive marketing strategy planned to ensure that we keep our marketing and outreach efforts at optimum levels! Be sure to keep your eyes open for numerous specials and promotions throughout the year!

Other Ways You Can Help

Feel free to share or repost our campaign to help us get the word out and make some noise!
